  2775                                  ;************************************************************************
  2776                                  ;*									*
  2777                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2778                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2779                                  ;*									*
  2780                                  ;************************************************************************
  2781                                  
  2782                                  int19:
  2783 000007BE 0E                      		push	cs
  2784 000007BF 1F                      		pop	ds
  2785                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2786                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022

  2789 000007C2 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
  2790 000007C4 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
  2791                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2792 000007C6 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2793                                  next_int:				
  2794 000007C9 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2795 000007CA 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2796 000007CB D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2797 000007CD D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2798                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2799                                  		;mov	di, ax
  2800                                  		;lodsw
  2801                                  		;stosw
  2802                                  		;lodsw
  2803                                  		;stosw			; install the saved vector
  2804                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:076Ah
  2805 000007CF 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  2806 000007D0 A5                      		movsw
  2807 000007D1 A5                      		movsw
  2808 000007D2 E2F5                    		loop	next_int
  2809                                  		;cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022

  2811 000007D8 7419                    		jz	short doint19
  2812 000007DA BE[3906]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2813                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2814                                  		;mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2815                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2816 000007DD B10E                    		mov	cl, 14	
  2817                                  i19_restore_loop:			
  2818 000007DF AC                      		lodsb			; get interrupt	number
  2819 000007E0 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2820                                  		;mov	di, ax
  2821                                  		;lodsw			; get original vector offset
  2822                                  		;mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2823                                  		;lodsw
  2824                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2825 000007E1 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  2826 000007E2 AD                      		lodsw
  2827 000007E3 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2828 000007E4 AD                      		lodsw
  2829                                  		;cmp	bx, 0FFFFh	; check	for 0ffffh (unlikely segment)
  2830 000007E5 43                      		inc	bx ; 07/08/2023
  2831 000007E6 7409                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too
  2832                                  		;cmp	ax, 0FFFFh	; opt 0ffffh is	unlikely offset
  2833                                  		;jz	short i19_restor_1
  2834 000007E8 4B                      		dec	bx ; 07/08/2023

  2836 000007EB 01FF                    		add	di, di

  2838 000007EE AB                      		stosw
  2839 000007EF 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2840 000007F0 AB                      		stosw			; put the vector back
  2841                                  
  2842                                  i19_restor_1:				
  2843 000007F1 E2EC                    		loop	i19_restore_loop
  2844                                  
  2845                                  doint19:

  2847 000007F3 380E[0D00]              		cmp	[inHMA], cl ; 0 ; 07/08/2023
  2848 000007F7 7403                    		jz	short SkipVDisk

  2860                                  ; procedure : int15
  2861                                  ;
  2862                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2863                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2864                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2865                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2866                                  ;
  2867                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2868                                  
  2869                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2870                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2871                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2872                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2873                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2874                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2875                                  
  2876                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2877                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2878 000007FE 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2879                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2880                                  		;jz	short int15_1
  2881                                  		;jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2882                                  		;;jmp	cs:Old15
  2883 00000801 751C                    		jnz	short Old15_j	; 07/08/2023 
  2884                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2885                                  int15_1:				
  2886 00000803 1E                      		push	ds
  2887 00000804 50                      		push	ax
  2888                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2889                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:07A5h
  2890                                  		;mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2891                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  2892                                  		;;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2893                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  2894                                  		;mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2895 00000805 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  2896 00000807 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2897 00000809 A01704                  		mov	al, [0417h]	; KBFLAG = 0417h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  2898 0000080C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2899 0000080E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2900 00000810 750A                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2901                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2902                                  		;push	cs
  2903                                  		;pop	ds
  2904                                  		;cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2905 00000812 2E3826[0D00]            		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], ah ; 0
  2906 00000817 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2907 00000819 E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2908                                  int15_2:				
  2909 0000081C 58                      		pop	ax
  2910 0000081D 1F                      		pop	ds

  2914                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15

  2935 0000082D 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax

  2937                                  		; 07/08/2023

  2939 00000832 89F9                    		mov	cx, di ; 16
  2940                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  2941 00000834 40                      		inc	ax ; ax = 0
  2942 00000835 F3AB                    		rep stosw		; clear	it
  2943 00000837 07                      		pop	es
  2944 00000838 5F                      		pop	di
  2945 00000839 59                      		pop	cx
  2946                                  		;pop	ax ; 07/08/2023
  2947 0000083A C3                      		retn

  2997                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2998                                  
  2999                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3000                                  ;
  3001                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3002                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3003                                  
  3004 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3005                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3006 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3007 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3008 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3009 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3010 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3011                                  
  3012                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3013                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3014                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3015                                  
  3016 0000084D 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3017 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3018 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3019 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3020 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3021 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3022 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3023                                  
  3024                                  NextStack:
  3025                                  
  3026                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3027                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3028                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3029                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3030                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3031                                  
  3032 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3033 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3034 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3035 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3036 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3037                                  
  3038                                  					;SR;
  3039 0000086F 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3040                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3041                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3042                                  
  3043                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3044                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3045                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3046                                  
  3047                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3048 00000870 57                      		push	di
  3049 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3050 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3051 00000873 50                      		push	ax
  3052 00000874 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3053 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3054 00000878 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3055 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3056 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3057                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3058                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3059 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3060 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3061 00000884 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3062                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3063 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3064                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  3065 00000887 B8[9108]                		mov	ax, Skip
  3066 0000088A 50                      		push	ax
  3067 0000088B 06                      		push	es
  3068 0000088C 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3069 0000088D B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  3070 00000890 CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3071                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3072                                  
  3073                                  Skip:					
  3074 00000891 58                      		pop	ax
  3075 00000892 5B                      		pop	bx
  3076 00000893 07                      		pop	es
  3077 00000894 5F                      		pop	di
  3078 00000895 CB                      		retf
  3079

  3354                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3355                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3356                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3357                                  
  3358                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3359                                  
  3360                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3361                                  ;
  3362                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3363                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3364                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3365                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3366                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3367                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3368                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3369                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3370                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3371                                  ;
  3372                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3373                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3374                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3375                                  ;
  3376                                  ;	uses:	
  3377                                  ;
  3378                                  ;
  3379                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3380                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3381                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3382                                  ;
  3383                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3384                                  
  3385                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3386                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3387                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3388                                  
  3389                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3390                                  
  3391                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3392                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3393                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3394                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3395                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3396                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3397                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3398                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3399                                  
  3400                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3401                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3402                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3403                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3404                                  
  3405                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3406                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3407                                  
  3408                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3409 0000127D 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3410 00001280 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3411 00001282 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3412 00001285 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3413 00001287 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3414 0000128A 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3415                                  atd1:
  3416 0000128C 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3417                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3418                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3419                                  
  3420                                  atd2:					
  3421 00001291 53                      		push	bx
  3422 00001292 51                      		push	cx
  3423 00001293 52                      		push	dx
  3424 00001294 57                      		push	di
  3425 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
  3426 00001296 06                      		push	es
  3427 00001297 50                      		push	ax
  3428 00001298 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3429                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3430 0000129B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3431                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3432 0000129D C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3433                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3434                                  					; initially no error code.
  3435 000012A2 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3436 000012A5 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3437                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3438 000012A9 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3439                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3440 000012AB C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3441 000012B0 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3442                                  					; return
  3443                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3444                                  
  3445                                  atd3:					
  3446 000012B2 53                      		push	bx
  3447 000012B3 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3448 000012B5 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3449 000012B8 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3450 000012BA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3451 000012BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  3452 000012BD 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3453 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
  3454 000012C1 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3455 000012C4 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3456 000012C6 58                      		pop	ax
  3457 000012C7 50                      		push	ax
  3458 000012C8 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3459 000012CB BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3460 000012CE EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3461 000012CF E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3462                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3463                                  
  3464                                  atd4:	
  3465                                  
  3466                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3467                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3468                                  				
  3469 000012D2 58                      		pop	ax
  3470                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3471 000012D3 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3472 000012D7 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3473 000012D9 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3474 000012DB F9                      		stc
  3475                                  atd5:					
  3476 000012DC 07                      		pop	es
  3477 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3478 000012DE 5F                      		pop	di
  3479 000012DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3480 000012E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3481 000012E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3482 000012E2 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3483                                  
  3484                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3485                                  
  3486                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3487                                  ;
  3488                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3489                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3490                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3491                                  ;	
  3492                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3493                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3494                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3495                                  ;
  3496                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3497                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3498                                  ;
  3499                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3500                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3501                                  
  3502                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3503                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3504                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3505 000012E5 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3506                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3507 000012E8 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3508 000012ED 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3509 000012F0 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3510 000012F2 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3511                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3512                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3513                                  setc1:					
  3514 000012F7 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3515 000012F9 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3516                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3517                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3518 000012FB A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3519 000012FE 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3520 00001302 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3521 00001304 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3522                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3523 00001307 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3524 0000130A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3525 0000130C C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3526 0000130F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3527 00001312 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3528 00001314 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3529                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3530 00001316 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3531 00001319 06                      		push	es
  3532 0000131A 53                      		push	bx
  3533 0000131B 0E                      		push	cs
  3534 0000131C E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3535 0000131F 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3536                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3537 00001323 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3538                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3539 00001326 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3540                                  					; only use low part
  3541 00001329 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3542                                  					; control byte modifier
  3543 0000132D 5B                      		pop	bx
  3544 0000132E 07                      		pop	es
  3545                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3546 0000132F 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3547 00001333 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3548 00001336 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3549                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3550 00001338 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3551 0000133C C3                      		retn
  3552                                  
  3553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3554                                  
  3555                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3556                                  ;
  3557                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3558                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3559                                  ;
  3560                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3561                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3562                                  ;
  3563                                  ;	
  3564                                  ;
  3565                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3566                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3567                                  ;
  3568                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3569                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3570                                  
  3571                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3572 0000133D 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3573 0000133F 0E                      		push	cs
  3574 00001340 E84000                  		call	command
  3575 00001343 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3576                                  doc1:					
  3577 00001345 0E                      		push	cs
  3578 00001346 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3579 00001349 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3580 0000134B B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3581 0000134E BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3582 00001351 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3583 00001352 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3584                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3585                                  
  3586                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3587                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3588                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3589                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3590                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3591                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3592                                  ;
  3593                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3594                                  
  3595                                  rsct_loop:				
  3596 00001353 6D                      		insw
  3597 00001354 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3598 00001356 FB                      		sti
  3599                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3600 00001357 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3601                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3602                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3603 0000135C 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3604 0000135E 0E                      		push	cs
  3605 0000135F E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3606 00001362 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3607 00001364 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3608 00001367 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3609 0000136A FA                      		cli
  3610 0000136B F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3611 0000136D FB                      		sti
  3612                                  doc2:					
  3613 0000136E 0E                      		push	cs
  3614 0000136F E82900                  		call	check_status
  3615 00001372 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3616                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3617 00001374 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3618 00001378 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3619                                  doc3:					
  3620 0000137A C3                      		retn
  3621                                  
  3622                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3623                                  
  3624                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3625                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3626                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3627                                  
  3628                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3629                                  
  3630                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3631                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3632                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3633                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3634                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3635                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3636                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3637                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3638                                  
  3639                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3640                                  ;
  3641                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3642                                  ;
  3643                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3644                                  ;
  3645                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3646                                  ;
  3647                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3648                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3649                                  ;	
  3650                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3651                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3652                                  
  3653                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3654                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3655                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3656                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3657 0000137B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3658 0000137E EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3659                                  
  3660                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3661                                  
  3662                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3663                                  ;
  3664                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3665                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3666                                  ;
  3667                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3668                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3669                                  ;
  3670                                  ;
  3671                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3672                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3673                                  ;
  3674                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3675                                  
  3676                                  command:	; proc near		
  3677                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3678                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3679                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3680 00001383 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3681 00001386 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3682                                  
  3683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3684                                  
  3685                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3686                                  ;
  3687                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3688                                  ;
  3689                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3690                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3691                                  ;
  3692                                  ;
  3693                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3694                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3695                                  ;		
  3696                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3697                                  
  3698                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3699                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3700                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3701                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3702 0000138B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3703 0000138E EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3704                                  
  3705                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3706                                  
  3707                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3708                                  ;
  3709                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3710                                  ;
  3711                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3712                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3713                                  ;
  3714                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3715                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3716                                  
  3717                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3718                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3719                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3720                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3721 00001393 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3722 00001396 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3723                                  
  3724                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3725                                  
  3726                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3727                                  ;
  3728                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3729                                  ;
  3730                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3731                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3732                                  ;
  3733                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3734                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3735                                  
  3736                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3737                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3738                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3739                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3740 0000139B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3741 0000139E EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3742                                  
  3743                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3744                                  
  3745                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3746                                  ;
  3747                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3748                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3749                                  ;
  3750                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3751                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3752                                  ;
  3753                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3754                                  
  3755                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3756                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3757                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3758                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3759 000013A3 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3760 000013A6 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3761                                  
  3762                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3763                                  
  3764                                  endatrom:
  3765                                  
  3766                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3767                                  
  3768                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3769                                  ;;
  3770                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3771                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3772                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3773                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3774                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3775                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3776                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3777                                  
  3778                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3779 000013AB 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3780                                  					;
  3781                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3782                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3783                                  					;
  3784                                  					; warning!!!
  3785                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3786 000013AE 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3787                                  no_hookit:				
  3788                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3789                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3790 000013B0 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3791                                  
  3792                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3793                                  
  3794                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3795 000013B5 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3796 000013B8 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3797 000013BA 1E                      		push	ds
  3798                                  		
  3799                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3800                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3801                                  		;push	ax
  3802                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3803                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3804                                  		;pop	ax
  3805 000013BB 6A40                    		push	40h
  3806 000013BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3807                                  
  3808 000013BE 9C                      		pushf
  3809                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3810                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3811 000013BF 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3812 000013C4 1F                      		pop	ds
  3813 000013C5 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3814                                  
  3815                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3816                                  
  3817 000013C8 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3818                                  
  3819                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3820                                  
  3821                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3822                                  %if 0  
  3823                                  
  3824                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3825                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3826                                  
  3827                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3828                                  
  3829                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3830                                  ;
  3831                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3832                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3833                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3834                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3835                                  
  3836                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3837                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3838                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3839                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3840                                  		jnb	short century20
  3841                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3842                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3843                                  		jmp	short years
  3844                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3845                                  		
  3846                                  century20:				
  3847                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3848                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3849                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3850                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3851                                  years:					
  3852                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3853                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3854                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3855                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3856                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3857                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3858                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3859                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3860                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3861                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3862                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3863                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3864                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3865                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3866                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3867                                  regularyear:				
  3868                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3869                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3870                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3871                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3872                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  3873                                  					;
  3874                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3875                                  leapyear:				
  3876                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3877                                  					; change month table.
  3878                                  yeardone:				
  3879                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3880                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3881                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3882                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3883                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3884                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3885                                  months:					
  3886                                  		inc	bl
  3887                                  
  3888                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3889                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3890                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3891                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3892                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3893                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3894                                  		
  3895                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3896                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3897                                  					; dh=0
  3898                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3899                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3900                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3901                                  		loop	months		;
  3902                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3903                                  month_done:				
  3904                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3905                                  					; restore month table value
  3906                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3907                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3908                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3909                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3910                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3911                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3912                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3913                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3914                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3915                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3916                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3917                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3918                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3919                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3920                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3921                                  		mov	ch, al
  3922                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3923                                  		retf
  3924                                  
  3925                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3926                                  
  3927                                  %endif
  3928                                  
  3929                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3930                                  
  3931                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3932                                  %if 0  
  3933                                  
  3934                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3935                                  
  3936                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3937                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3938                                  		
  3939                                  		push	cx		
  3940                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3941                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3942                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3943                                  		or	al, ah
  3944                                  		pop	cx
  3945                                  		retf
  3946                                  %endif
  3947                                  
  3948                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3949                                  
  3950                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3951                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3952                                  
  3953                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3954                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3955                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3956                                  
  3957                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3958                                  
  3959                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3960                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3961                                  int_6Ch:
  3962 000013C9 0E                      		push	cs
  3963 000013CA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3964                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3965 000013CB 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3966 000013D0 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3967 000013D2 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3968 000013D5 FFD3                    		call    bx
  3969                                  int6c:					
  3970                                  		;push	cs
  3971                                  		;pop	ds
  3972 000013D7 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3973 000013DB 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3974 000013DF 9D                      		popf
  3975 000013E0 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3976 000013E3 FA                      		cli
  3977 000013E4 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3978 000013E8 FB                      		sti
  3979 000013E9 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3980 000013EC FA                      		cli
  3981 000013ED B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3982 000013EF CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3983                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3984                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3985 000013F1 FB                      		sti
  3986                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3987                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3988 000013F2 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3989                                  
  3990                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3991                                  
  3992                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3993                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3994                                  
  3995                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3996 000013F6 50                      		push	ax
  3997 000013F7 51                      		push	cx
  3998 000013F8 52                      		push	dx
  3999 000013F9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4000 000013FB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4001                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4002                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4003                                  					; midnight
  4004                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4005 000013FD 5A                      		pop	dx
  4006 000013FE 59                      		pop	cx
  4007 000013FF 58                      		pop	ax
  4008 00001400 50                      		push	ax
  4009 00001401 53                      		push	bx
  4010 00001402 51                      		push	cx
  4011 00001403 52                      		push	dx
  4012                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4013                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4014                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4015 00001404 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4016                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4017 0000140A B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4018 0000140C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4019                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4020                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4021                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4022                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4023 0000140E 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4024 00001410 E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4025                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4026                                  
  4027                                  read_ok:
  4028 00001413 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4029 00001417 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4030 0000141B 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4031 0000141F 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4032                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4033                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4034                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4035 00001423 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4036 00001427 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4037 0000142A 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4038                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4039                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4040                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4041 0000142C FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4042 00001430 E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4043 00001433 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4044                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4045                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4046 00001435 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4047 0000143A E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4048 0000143D A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4049 00001440 98                      		cbw
  4050 00001441 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4051 00001446 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4052 00001448 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4053                                  century_19:				
  4054 0000144B 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4055 0000144E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4056 00001450 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4057 00001452 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4058 00001454 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4059 00001455 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4060                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4061 00001458 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4062                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4063                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4064 0000145A A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax

  4066 0000145F 98                      		cbw
  4067 00001460 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4068 00001462 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4069 00001464 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4070 00001467 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4071                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4072                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4073 00001469 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4074 0000146D EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4075                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4076                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4077                                  
  4078                                  leap_year:
  4079 0000146F 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4080 00001474 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4081                                  leap_adjustment:
  4082                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4083                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4084 00001476 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4085                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4086 0000147A 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4087 0000147E 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4088 00001480 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4089                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4090                                  		; 08/08/2023

  4092 00001485 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4093                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4094                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4095 00001489 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4096

  4098                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4099                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4100                                  		;add	si, cx
  4101                                  		;; 16/10/2022

  4103                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4104                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4105                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4106                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4107                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4108                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4109                                  
  4110                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4111                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4112 0000148A B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4113 0000148C BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4114                                  r_d_sum_loop:

  4116 00001490 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax

  4123 0000149B 59                      		pop	cx
  4124 0000149C 5B                      		pop	bx
  4125 0000149D 58                      		pop	ax
  4126 0000149E C3                      		retn
  4127                                  
  4128                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4129                                  
  4130                                  r_t_retj:				
  4131 0000149F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4132 000014A1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4133 000014A3 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4134                                  
  4135                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4136                                  
  4137                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4138                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4139                                  
  4140                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4141 000014A5 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4142 000014A7 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4143                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4144                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4145                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4146 000014A9 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4147 000014AB 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4148 000014AF 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4149 000014B3 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4150 000014B7 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4151 000014BC E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4152 000014BF 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4153 000014C1 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4154 000014C4 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4155 000014C6 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4156 000014C9 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4157 000014CD 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4158 000014D1 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4159 000014D5 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4160                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4161                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4162                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4163 000014D9 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4164                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4165                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4166                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4167                                  r_t_ret:				
  4168 000014DD C3                      		retn
  4169                                  
  4170                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4171                                  
  4172                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4173                                  
  4174                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4175 000014DE A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4176 000014E1 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4177 000014E4 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4178 000014E7 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4179 000014EA E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4180 000014ED A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4181 000014F0 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4182 000014F3 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4183 000014F6 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4184 000014F9 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4185 000014FC E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4186 000014FF A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4187 00001502 C3                      		retn
  4188                                  
  4189                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4190                                  
  4191                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4192                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4193                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4194                                  
  4195                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4196 00001503 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4197 00001505 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4198 00001507 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4199 00001509 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4200 0000150B D50A                    		aad
  4201 0000150D C3                      		retn
  4202                                  
  4203                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4204                                  
  4205                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4206                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4207                                  
  4208                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4209 0000150E 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4210 00001513 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4211 00001515 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4212 00001517 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4213                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4214                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4215 0000151C 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4216 0000151E 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4217                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4218                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4219 00001523 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4220                                  century_20:
  4221 00001525 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4222 0000152A 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4223 0000152C 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4224 00001531 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4225 00001533 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4226                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4227 00001538 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4228 0000153A 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4229 0000153F 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4230                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4231                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4232                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4233                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4234                                  		; cf=0
  4235                                  		;clc
  4236                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4237 00001541 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4238 00001546 C3                      		retn
  4239                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4240                                  
  4241                                  date_error:
  4242 00001547 F9                      		stc
  4243                                  date_err2:
  4244 00001548 C3                      		retn
  4245                                  
  4246                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4247                                  
  4248                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4249                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4250                                  
  4251                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4252 00001549 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4253 0000154E 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4254 00001550 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4255 00001555 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4256                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4257                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4258                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4259                                  		;clc
  4260                                  		;retn
  4261                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4262 00001557 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4263                                  time_error:
  4264                                  bv_error:
  4265 0000155C F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4266 0000155D C3                      		retn
  4267                                  
  4268                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4269                                  
  4270                                  ;time_error:

  4272                                  		;retn
  4273                                  
  4274                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4275                                  
  4276                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4277                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4278                                  
  4279                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4280 0000155E B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4281 00001561 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4282                                  bv_loop:
  4283 00001564 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4284 00001566 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4285 00001568 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4286                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4287 0000156B 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4288 0000156D 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4289 0000156F D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4290 00001571 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4291 00001573 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4292 00001575 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4293 00001577 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4294 0000157A 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4295 0000157D 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4296 0000157F 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4297 00001580 49                      		dec	cx
  4298 00001581 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4299 00001583 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4300 00001584 C3                      		retn
  4301                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4302                                  
  4303                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4304                                  ;bv_error:
  4305                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4306                                  		;retn
  4307                                  
  4308                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4309                                  
  4310                                  endk09:
