  7358                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7359                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7362                                  
  7363                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7364                                  ;
  7365                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7366                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7367                                  ;
  7368                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7369                                  ;
  7370                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7371                                  ;   initialize it.
  7372                                  ;
  7373                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7374                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7375                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7376                                  ;
  7377                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7378                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7379                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7380                                  ;
  7381                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7382                                  ;   save coding.
  7383                                  ;
  7384                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7385                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7386                                  ;
  7387                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7388                                  ;
  7389                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7390                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7391                                  ;
  7392                                  ; called modules:
  7393                                  ;		  getboot
  7394                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7395                                  ;
  7396                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7397                                  ;
  7398                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7399                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7400                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7401                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7402                                  ;
  7403                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7404                                  
  7405                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7406                                  domini:	
  7407 00001FC3 8A36[0D16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7408                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7409 00001FC7 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7410                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7411 00001FC9 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7412 00001FCB B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7413                                  domini_loop:				
  7414 00001FCD 52                      		push	dx
  7415 00001FCE 8816[0C16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7416 00001FD2 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7417 00001FD4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7418                                  					; DL = drive number
  7419                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7420                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7421                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7422                                  		
  7423                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7424                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7425                                  		;inc	dh
  7426                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7427                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7428 00001FD6 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7429 00001FD8 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7430 00001FDA 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7431 00001FDB A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7432                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7433                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7434                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7435 00001FDE 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7436 00001FE0 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7437 00001FE3 A3[1416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7438 00001FE6 06                      		push	es
  7439 00001FE7 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7440 00001FEB E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7441                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7442 00001FEE 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7443 00001FF0 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7444                                  domininext:				
  7445 00001FF3 07                      		pop	es
  7446 00001FF4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7447 00001FF5 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7448 00001FF7 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7449 00001FF9 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7450                                  dominiret:				
  7451 00001FFB C3                      		retn
  7452                                  
  7453                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7454                                  
  7455                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7456                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7457                                  
  7458                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7459                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7460                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7461                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7462                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7463                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7464                                  ;
  7465                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7466                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7467                                  
  7468                                  
  7469                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7470 00001FFC 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7471                                  fmpnext:				
  7472 00002000 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7473 00002004 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7474 00002006 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7475 00002009 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7476 0000200D 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7477                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7478                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7479                                  fmpnextfound:
  7480 0000200F C3                      		retn
  7481                                  
  7482                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7483                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7484                                  ;fmpret:
  7485                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7486                                  
  7487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7488                                  
  7489                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7490                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7491 00002010 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7492 00002013 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7493 00002015 8B3E[1016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7494 00002019 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7495                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7496 0000201E 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7497                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7498                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7499 00002022 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7500                                  					; ffHardFile
  7501 00002026 C606[8E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7502 0000202B A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7503 0000202E 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7504 00002031 A1[1416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7505 00002034 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7506 00002037 A0[0C16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7507 0000203A 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7508                                  					; set physical number
  7509 0000203D A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7510 00002040 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7511                                  					; set logical number
  7512 00002043 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7513 00002048 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7514 0000204A 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7515                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7516 0000204F 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7517                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7518                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7519 00002051 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7520 00002054 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7521 00002058 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7522 0000205B D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7523 0000205D D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7524 0000205F 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7525 00002063 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7526                                  					; set hidden trks
  7527 00002066 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7528 0000206A 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7529 0000206E 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7530 00002072 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7531 00002075 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7532 00002078 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7533                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7534                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7535                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7536 0000207A 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7537 0000207C BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7538                                  
  7539                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7540                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7541 0000207F 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7542 00002085 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7543                                  
  7544                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7545                                  		;push	es
  7546 00002087 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7547                                  					; bx value saved.
  7548                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7549 0000208A 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7550 0000208C E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7551                                  fmpnextchain:
  7552 0000208F E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7553                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7554                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7555                                  
  7556                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7557                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7558                                  		;retn
  7559                                  
  7560                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7561                                  
  7562                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7563                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7564                                  
  7565                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7566                                  	
  7567 00002092 57                      		push	di
  7568 00002093 53                      		push	bx
  7569                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7570                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7571                                  		;push	ds
  7572 00002094 06                      		push	es
  7573                                  setmini_1:				
  7574 00002095 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7575 00002099 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7576 0000209B 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7577 0000209F 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7578 000020A1 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7579 000020A5 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7580 000020A7 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7581 000020AA 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7582 000020AE 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7583 000020B0 F9                      		stc
  7584 000020B1 07                      		pop	es
  7585                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7586                                  		;pop	ds
  7587 000020B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7588 000020B3 5F                      		pop	di
  7589 000020B4 C3                      		retn
  7590                                  
  7591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7592                                  setmini_2:
  7593 000020B5 E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7594

  7596                                  
  7597                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7598                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7599                                  
  7600                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7601                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7602                                  ;
  7603                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7604                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7605                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7606                                  ;
  7607                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7608                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7609                                  ;			trash ax
  7610                                  
  7611                                  dmax_check:
  7612 000020B8 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7613 000020BD 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7614 000020BF 06                      		push	es
  7615                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7616 000020C0 B84404                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7617 000020C3 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7618                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7619 000020C5 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7620                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7621                                  					; set message flag
  7622                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7623 000020CB 07                      		pop	es
  7624                                  
  7625                                  		;;push	es
  7626                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7627                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7628                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7629                                  					; set message flag
  7630                                  		;;pop	es
  7631                                  		;
  7632                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7633                                  dmax_ok:
  7634 000020CC C3                      		retn
  7635                                  
  7636                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7637                                  
  7638                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7639                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7640                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7641                                  ;								 
  7642                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7643                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7644                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7645                                  
  7646                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7647 000020CD 56                      		push	si
  7648 000020CE 53                      		push	bx
  7649 000020CF 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7650                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7651 000020D3 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7652 000020D6 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7653                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7654 000020D8 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7655 000020DA EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7657                                  
  7658                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7659                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7660 000020DC 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7661                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7662 000020DE 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7663                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7664 000020E1 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7665                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7666 000020E5 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7667                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7668                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7669 000020E8 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7670 000020EB 8B36[0E16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7671 000020EF 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7672 000020F1 8306[0E16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7673 000020F6 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7674 000020FA 8306[1016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7675 000020FF 5B                      		pop	bx
  7676 00002100 5E                      		pop	si
  7677 00002101 C3                      		retn
  7678                                  
  7679                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7680                                  
  7681                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7682                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7683                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7684                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7685                                  
  7686                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7687 00002102 50                      		push	ax
  7688 00002103 51                      		push	cx
  7689 00002104 52                      		push	dx
  7690 00002105 55                      		push	bp
  7691 00002106 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7692                                  loop_clock:				
  7693 00002108 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7694 0000210A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7695 0000210C B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7696 0000210E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7697                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7698                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7699                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7700 00002110 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7701 00002113 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7702 00002115 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7703 00002118 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7704 0000211A 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7705 0000211D 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7706 0000211F 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7707 00002120 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7708                                  delay:					
  7709 00002123 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7710 00002125 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7712                                  
  7713                                  clock_present:				
  7714 00002127 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7715 0000212D E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7716                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7717                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7718 00002130 56                      		push	si
  7719 00002131 E8C2F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7720 00002134 FA                      		cli
  7721                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7722 00002135 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7723 00002139 FB                      		sti
  7724 0000213A 5E                      		pop	si
  7725                                  
  7726                                  no_readdate:				
  7727 0000213B 5D                      		pop	bp
  7728 0000213C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7729 0000213D 59                      		pop	cx
  7730 0000213E 58                      		pop	ax
  7731 0000213F C3                      		retn
  7732                                  
  7733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7734                                  
  7735                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7736                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7737                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7738                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7739                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7740                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7741                                  ;
  7742                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7743                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7744                                  ;
  7745                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7746                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7747                                  ;
  7748                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7749                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7750                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7751                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7752                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7753                                  ;
  7754                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7755                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7756                                  
  7757                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7758                                  
  7759                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7760                                  
  7761                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7762                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7763                                  			
  7764 00002140 50                      		push	ax
  7765 00002141 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7766 00002147 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7767 00002149 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7768                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7769 0000214F 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7770 00002151 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7771                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7772 00002157 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7773                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7774                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7775                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7776                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7777                                  cmosck4:				
  7778 00002159 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7779                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7780 0000215B B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7781                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7782 0000215D E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7783 00002160 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7784                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7785 00002162 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7786 00002165 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7787                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7788 00002167 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7789 00002169 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7790                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7791 0000216B E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7792                                  cmosck9:				
  7793 0000216E 58                      		pop	ax
  7794 0000216F C3                      		retn
  7795                                  
  7796                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7797                                  
  7798                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7799                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7800                                  ;									       :
  7801                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7802                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7803                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7804                                  ;									       :
  7805                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7806                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7807                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7808                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7809                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7810                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7811                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7812                                  
  7813                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7814 00002170 9C                      		pushf
  7815 00002171 FA                      		cli
  7816 00002172 53                      		push	bx
  7817 00002173 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7818 00002174 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7819 00002176 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7820                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7821 00002178 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7822 00002179 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7823 0000217B 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7824 0000217D 58                      		pop	ax
  7825 0000217E 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7826 00002180 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7827 00002182 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7828                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7829 00002184 90                      		nop
  7830 00002185 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7831 00002187 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7832 00002189 5B                      		pop	bx
  7833 0000218A 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7834 0000218B E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7835 0000218E C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7836                                  
  7837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7838                                  
  7839                                  cmos_popf:				
  7840 0000218F CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7841                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7842                                  
  7843                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7844                                  
  7845                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7846                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7847                                  ;									       :
  7848                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7849                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7850                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7851                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7852                                  ;									       :
  7853                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7854                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7855                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7856                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7857                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7858                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7859                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7860                                  
  7861                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7862 00002190 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7863 00002191 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7864 00002192 FA                      		cli
  7865 00002193 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7866 00002194 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7867 00002196 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7868                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7869 00002198 90                      		nop
  7870 00002199 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7871 0000219B E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7872 0000219D 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7873 0000219E 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7874 000021A0 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7875 000021A2 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7876                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7877 000021A4 90                      		nop
  7878 000021A5 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7879 000021A7 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7880 000021A8 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7881 000021A9 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7882 000021AC C3                      		retn
  7883                                  
  7884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7885                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7886                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7887                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7889                                  
  7890                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7891                                  ;
  7892                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7893                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7894                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7895                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7896                                  
  7897                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7898                                  
  7899                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7900                                  ;
  7901                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7902                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7903                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7904                                  
  7905                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7906                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7907                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7908                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7909                                  
  7910                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7911                                  getclus:				
  7912 000021AD 51                      		push	cx
  7913 000021AE 57                      		push	di
  7914 000021AF 2E890E[8C15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7915 000021B4 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7916 000021B6 48                      		dec	ax
  7917 000021B7 48                      		dec	ax
  7918 000021B8 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7919                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7920                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7921 000021BA 2E0306[8815]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7922 000021BF 2E1316[8A15]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7923                                  unpack:					
  7924 000021C4 1E                      		push	ds
  7925 000021C5 50                      		push	ax
  7926 000021C6 53                      		push	bx
  7927 000021C7 2E8B36[8F15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7928 000021CC 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7929 000021CE 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7930 000021D0 2EF606[8E15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7931                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7932 000021D6 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7933 000021D8 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7934                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7935 000021DA 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7936                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7937 000021DC 52                      		push	dx
  7938 000021DD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7939 000021DF E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7940 000021E2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7941 000021E3 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7942 000021E5 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7943                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7944                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7945 000021E7 2EA2[9615]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7946 000021EB 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7947 000021EC 52                      		push	dx
  7948 000021ED 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7949 000021EF E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7950 000021F2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7951                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7952 000021F3 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7953 000021F6 2EA2[9715]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7954 000021FA 2EA1[9615]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7955                                  even_odd:				
  7956 000021FE 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7957 000021FF 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7958 00002200 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7959 00002202 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7960 00002204 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7961                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7962 00002206 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7963 00002208 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7964 0000220A D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7965                                  havclus:				
  7966 0000220C 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7967 0000220E 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7968 00002212 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7969                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7970                                  
  7971                                  unpack16:				
  7972 00002214 52                      		push	dx
  7973 00002215 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7974 00002217 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7975 00002219 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7976 0000221C E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7977 0000221F 5A                      		pop	dx
  7978 00002220 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7979                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7980                                  unpackx:				
  7981 00002222 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7982 00002223 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7983 00002224 1F                      		pop	ds
  7984 00002225 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7985 00002227 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7986 0000222A 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7987 0000222C 2E010E[8C15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7988 00002231 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7989                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7990                                  
  7991                                  getcl2:					
  7992 00002233 53                      		push	bx
  7993 00002234 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7994 00002235 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7995 00002236 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7996 0000223A 2E8B0E[8C15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7997 0000223F 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7998 00002240 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7999                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  8000 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  8001 00002246 0E                      		push	cs
  8002 00002247 1F                      		pop	ds
  8003 00002248 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8004                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8005 00002249 BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8006                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8007                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8008 0000224C E8D2F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  8009 0000224F 1F                      		pop	ds
  8010 00002250 5B                      		pop	bx
  8011 00002251 5F                      		pop	di
  8012 00002252 2EA1[8C15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8013 00002256 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8014 00002258 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8015 0000225A 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8016 0000225C 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8017 0000225D C3                      		retn
  8018                                  
  8019                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8020                                  
  8021                                  
  8022                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8023                                  ;
  8024                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8025                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8026                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8027                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8028                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8029                                  ;
  8030                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8031                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8032                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8033                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8034                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8035                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8036                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8037                                  
  8038                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8039                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8040 0000225E 50                      		push	ax
  8041 0000225F 51                      		push	cx
  8042 00002260 57                      		push	di
  8043 00002261 56                      		push	si
  8044 00002262 06                      		push	es
  8045 00002263 1E                      		push	ds
  8046 00002264 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8047 00002266 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8048 0000226B F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8049 0000226D 90                      		nop
  8050                                  
  8051                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8052                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8053                                  
  8054 0000226E 06                      		push	es
  8055 0000226F 1E                      		push	ds
  8056 00002270 57                      		push	di
  8057 00002271 50                      		push	ax
  8058 00002272 0E                      		push	cs
  8059 00002273 1F                      		pop	ds
  8060                                  
  8061 00002274 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8062 00002278 BD[6D05]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8063                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8064                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8065 0000227B 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8066 0000227C E8A2F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8067 0000227F 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8068 00002280 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8069                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8070 00002284 5F                      		pop	di
  8071 00002285 1F                      		pop	ds
  8072 00002286 07                      		pop	es
  8073 00002287 2E3B06[9815]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8074 0000228C 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8075 0000228E 2EA3[9815]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8076                                  					; sector number
  8077                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8078 00002292 52                      		push	dx
  8079 00002293 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8080                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8081                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8082 0000229A 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8083 0000229C B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8084 0000229F 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8085 000022A3 1E                      		push	ds
  8086 000022A4 07                      		pop	es
  8087 000022A5 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8088 000022A7 1E                      		push	ds
  8089 000022A8 0E                      		push	cs
  8090 000022A9 1F                      		pop	ds
  8091 000022AA 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8092 000022AB BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8093                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8094                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8095 000022AE E870F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8096 000022B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8097 000022B2 5A                      		pop	dx
  8098 000022B3 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8099                                  
  8100                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8101 000022B8 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8102 000022B9 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8103                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8104                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8105 000022BB 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8106 000022BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  8107 000022BE 07                      		pop	es
  8108 000022BF 5E                      		pop	si
  8109 000022C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8110 000022C1 59                      		pop	cx
  8111 000022C2 58                      		pop	ax
  8112 000022C3 C3                      		retn
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8115                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8116                                  
  8117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8118                                  
  8119                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8120                                  		;db 0
  8121                                  
  8122                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8123                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8124                                  
  8125                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8126 000022C4 00<rep Ch>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8127                                  %endif
  8128                                  
  8129                                  ;align 16
  8130                                  
  8131                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8132                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8133                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8134                                  
  8135                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8137                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8138                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8139                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8140                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8141                                  
  8142                                  ;============================================================================
  8143                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8144                                  ;============================================================================
  8145                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8146                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8147                                  
  8148                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8149                                  
  8150                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8151                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8152                                  
  8153                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8154                                   
  8155                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8156                                  
  8157                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8159                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8161                                  
  8162                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8163 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8164 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8165                                  
  8166                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8167                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8168                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8169                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8170                                  
  8171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8172                                  
  8173                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8174                                  
  8175                                  ;************************************************************************
  8176                                  ;*									*
  8177                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8178                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8179                                  ;*									*
  8180                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8181                                  ;*									*
  8182                                  ;************************************************************************
  8183                                  
  8184                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8185                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8186                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8187                                  
  8188                                  _seg_reinit:
  8189 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8190                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8191                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8192 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8193                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8194                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8195                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8196 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8197                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8198 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8199 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8200 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8201 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8202                                  
  8203                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8204                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8205                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8206                                  		
  8207                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8208 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8209                                  		
  8210 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8211                                  
  8212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8213                                  
  8214                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8215                                  
  8216                                  ;************************************************************************
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8219                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8220                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8221                                  ;*									*
  8222                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8223                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8224                                  ;*									*
  8225                                  ;************************************************************************
  8226                                  
  8227                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8228 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8229 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8230 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8231 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8232 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8233 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8234 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8235 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8236 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8237 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8238 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8239                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8240                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8241 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8242                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8243 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8244                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8245 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8246 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8247 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8248                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8249 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8250 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8251 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8252 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8253 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8254                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8255 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8256                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8257                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8258                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8259 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8260                                  
  8261                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8262                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8263                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8264                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8265                                  ;
  8266                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8267                                  ;
  8268                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8269                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8270                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8271                                  ;
  8272                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8273                                  
  8274                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8275                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8276 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8277 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8278 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8279 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8280                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8281                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8282 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8283 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8284                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8285                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8286 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8287 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8288 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8289 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8290 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8291 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8292 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8293 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8294 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8295 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8296                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8297 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8298                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8299 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8300 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8301                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8302                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8303                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8304                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8305 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8306                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8307 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8308 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8309                                  					; mark operation complete
  8310 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8311 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8312 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8313 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8314 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8315 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8316 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8317 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8318 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8319                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8320                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8321 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8322 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8323                                  
  8324                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8326                                  bc_retf:
  8327 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8328                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8329                                  
  8330                                  command_error:				
  8331 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8332 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8333                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8334                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8335                                  
  8336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8337                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8338                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8339                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8340                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8341                                  ; high.
  8342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8343                                  
  8344                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8345                                  
  8346                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8347                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8348                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8349                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8350                                  
  8351 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8352                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8353                                  		
  8354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8355                                  
  8356                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8357                                  
  8358                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8359 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8360                                  					; unknown command error
  8361                                  
  8362                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8363                                  
  8364                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8365                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8366                                  
  8367                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8368                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8369                                  
  8370                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8371                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8372                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8373 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8374 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8375                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8376 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8377 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8378 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8379                                  
  8380                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8381                                  
  8382                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8383                                  
  8384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8385                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8386                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8387                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8388                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8389                                  
  8390                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8391                                  
  8392                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8393                                  
  8394                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8395                                  
  8396                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8397                                  
  8398                                  ;************************************************************************
  8399                                  ;*									*
  8400                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8401                                  ;*									*
  8402                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8403                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8404                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8405                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8406                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8407                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8408                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8409                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8410                                  ;*									*
  8411                                  ;************************************************************************
  8412                                  
  8413                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8414                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8415                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8416 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8417                                  
  8418                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8419 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8420                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8421 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8422                                  					; 00 init
  8423 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8424 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8425 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8426                                  					; 03
  8427 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8428                                  					; 04
  8429 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8430                                  					; 05
  8431 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8432 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8433                                  					; 07
  8434 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8435                                  					; 08
  8436 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8437 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8438                                  con_table_end:
  8439 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8440                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8441 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8442 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8443 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8444 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8445 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8446                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8447 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8448                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8449 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8450 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8451 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8452 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8453 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8454 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8455 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8456 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8457 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8458 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8459 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8460 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8461 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8462 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8463 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8464 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8465 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8466 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8467 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8468 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8469                                  prn_table_end:
  8470 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8471                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8472 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8473 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8474 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8475 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8476 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8477 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8478 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8479 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8480 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8481 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8482 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8483                                  aux_table_end:
  8484 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8485                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8486 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8487 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8488 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8489 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8490 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8491 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8492 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8493 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8494 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8495 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8496                                  tim_table_end:
  8497
