  8498                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8499                                  
  8500                                  ;************************************************************************
  8501                                  ;*									*
  8502                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8503                                  ;*									*
  8504                                  ;************************************************************************
  8505                                  
  8506                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8507                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8508 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8509                                  con_loop:				
  8510 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8511 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8512 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8513                                  con_exit:				
  8514 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8515 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8518                                  
  8519                                  ;************************************************************************
  8520                                  ;*									*
  8521                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8522                                  ;*									*
  8523                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8524                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8525                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8526                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8527                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8528                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8529                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8530                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8531                                  ;*									*
  8532                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8533                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8534                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8535                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8536                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8537                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8538                                  ;*									*
  8539                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8540                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8541                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8542                                  ;*									*
  8543                                  ;************************************************************************
  8544                                  
  8545                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8546                                  chrin:		
  8547 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8548 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8549 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8550 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8551 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8552 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8553 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8554 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8555 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8556 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8557 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8558 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8559                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8560                                  
  8561                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8562                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8563                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8564                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8565                                  ;      else
  8566                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8567                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8568                                  ;      endif
  8569                                  ;    endif
  8570                                  ;  endif
  8571                                  
  8572                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8573 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8574 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8575 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8576 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8577 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8578 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8579 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8580 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8582                                  
  8583                                  not_ext:				
  8584 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8585 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8586                                  alt_save:				
  8587 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8588                                  keyret:					
  8589 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8590                                  
  8591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8592                                  
  8593                                  ;************************************************************************
  8594                                  ;*									*
  8595                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8596                                  ;*									*
  8597                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8598                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8599                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8600                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8601                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8602                                  ;*									*
  8603                                  ;************************************************************************
  8604                                  
  8605                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8606                                  con_rdnd:				
  8607 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8608 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8609 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8610 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8611 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8612 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8613 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8614 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8615 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8616                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8617 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8618                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8619 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8620 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8621 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8622 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8623                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8624                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8625                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8626                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8627 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8628 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8629 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8631                                  
  8632                                  gotchr:					
  8633 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8634 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8635 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8636 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8637 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8638                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8639                                  
  8640                                  notbrk:					
  8641 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8642 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8643 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8644 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8645                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8646                                  
  8647                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8648 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8649 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8650 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8651 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8652 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8653 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8654 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8655                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8656                                  rdexit:					
  8657 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8658 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8659                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8660                                  bc_exvec:				
  8661 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8662                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8663 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8664                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8665                                  
  8666                                  ;************************************************************************
  8667                                  ;*									*
  8668                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8669                                  ;*									*
  8670                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8671                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8672                                  ;*									*
  8673                                  ;************************************************************************
  8674                                  
  8675                                  con_writ:
  8676                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8677 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8678                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8679                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8680                                  con_lp:					
  8681 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8682 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8683 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8684                                  					; AL = character to display
  8685 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8686                                  cc_ret:					
  8687 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8688 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8689                                  
  8690                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8691                                  
  8692                                  ;************************************************************************
  8693                                  ;*									*
  8694                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8695                                  ;*									*
  8696                                  ;************************************************************************
  8697                                  
  8698                                  con_flush:
  8699 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8700                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8701 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8702 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8703                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8704                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8705                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8706 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8707 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8708 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8709                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8710 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8713                                  
  8714                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8715                                  
  8716                                  ;************************************************************************
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8719                                  ;*									*
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  
  8722                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8723                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8724                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8725                                  
  8726                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8727                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8728                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8729                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8730                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8731                                  ;
  8732                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8733                                  
  8734                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8735                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8736                                  
  8737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8738                                  
  8739                                  ;************************************************************************
  8740                                  ;*									*
  8741                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8742                                  ;*									*
  8743                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8744                                  ;*									*
  8745                                  ;************************************************************************
  8746                                  
  8747                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8748 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8749                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8750                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8751                                  prn_done:
  8752 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8753 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8754                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8755                                  
  8756                                  ;************************************************************************
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8759                                  ;*									*
  8760                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8761                                  ;*									*
  8762                                  ;************************************************************************
  8763                                  
  8764                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8765                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8766 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8767                                  prn_loop:				
  8768 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8769                                  prn_out:				
  8770 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8771 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8772 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8773 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8774 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8775 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8776 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8777 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8778 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8779 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8780 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8782                                  
  8783                                  _prnwf:					
  8784 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8785 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8786                                  TestPrnError:				
  8787 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8788 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8789                                  pmessg:					
  8790 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8791                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8792                                  
  8793                                  prn_con:				
  8794 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8795 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8796                                  ;prn_done:				
  8797                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8798                                  prn_done2:
  8799                                  		;clc
  8800                                  		; cf=0
  8801 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ;************************************************************************
  8805                                  ;*									*
  8806                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8807                                  ;*									*
  8808                                  ;************************************************************************
  8809                                  
  8810                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8811 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8812 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8813 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8814                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8815                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8816 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8817 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8819                                  
  8820                                  ;************************************************************************
  8821                                  ;*									*
  8822                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8823                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8824                                  ;*									*
  8825                                  ;************************************************************************
  8826                                  
  8827                                  prnstat:				
  8828 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8829                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8830                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8831                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8834                                  
  8835                                  ;************************************************************************
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8838                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8839                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8840                                  ;*									*
  8841                                  ;************************************************************************
  8842                                  
  8843                                  prnop:	
  8844 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8845 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8846                                  
  8847                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8848                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8849                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8850                                  
  8851 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8852 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8853 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8854 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8855 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8856 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8857 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8858                                  
  8859                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8860                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8861                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8862                                  
  8863                                  NextTest:				
  8864 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8865                                  					; i/o error?
  8866 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8867                                  
  8868                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8869                                  
  8870 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8871                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8872 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8873 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8874 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8875                                  ret1:					
  8876 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8878                                  
  8879                                  checknotready:				
  8880 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8881 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8882 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8883                                  
  8884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8885                                  
  8886                                  ;************************************************************************
  8887                                  ;*									*
  8888                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8889                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8890                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8891                                  ;*									*
  8892                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8893                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8894                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8895                                  ;*									*
  8896                                  ;************************************************************************
  8897                                  
  8898                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8899                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8900 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8901                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8902 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8903 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8904 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8905 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8906 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8907                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8908 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8909 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8910                                  prn_getstat:				
  8911 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8912 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8913 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8914 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8915 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8916 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8917 000002A7 26                      		es
  8918 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8919                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8920                                  					; lodsb
  8921 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8922 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8923 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8924 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8925                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8926                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8927                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8928 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8929                                  
  8930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8931                                  
  8932                                  prn_bperr:				
  8933 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8934                                  prn_berr:				
  8935 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8936                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8937

  8941                                  ;*									*

  8949                                  ;********************************;*
  8950                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8951                                  ;********************************;*
  8952

  8955                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h

  8969                                  					; ioc_pc

  8973 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

  8978 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8979 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh

  8982 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1

  8986 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount

  8994                                  					; return current retry count
  8995                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8996                                  		; cf=0
  8997                                  		;clc
  8998 000002EB C3                      		retn
  8999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9000

  9029                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9030                                  
  9031                                  ;************************************************************************
  9032                                  ;*									*
  9033                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9034                                  ;*									*
  9035                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9036                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9037                                  ;*									*
  9038                                  ;************************************************************************
  9039                                  
  9040                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9041                                  
  9042                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9043                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9044                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9045                                  
  9046                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9047                                  
  9048                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9049                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9050                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9051                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9052                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9053                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9054                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9055                                  
  9056                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9057                                  
  9058                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9059                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9060                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9061                                  
  9062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9063                                  
  9064                                  ;************************************************************************
  9065                                  ;*									*
  9066                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9067                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9068                                  ;*									*
  9069                                  ;************************************************************************
  9070                                  
  9071                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9072                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9073 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9074 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9075 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9076 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9077 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9078 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9079                                  aux1:					
  9080 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9081                                  					; won't return if error
  9082                                  aux2:					
  9083 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  9084 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9085                                  exvec2:					
  9086 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9087                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9088 0000031B C3                      		retn
  9089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9090                                  
  9091                                  ;************************************************************************
  9092                                  ;*									*
  9093                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9094                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9095                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9096                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9097                                  ;*									*
  9098                                  ;************************************************************************
  9099                                  
  9100                                  auxin:					
  9101 0000031C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9102 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9103 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9104                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9105                                  		;retn
  9106                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9107 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9108                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9109                                  
  9110                                  arbad:					
  9111 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9112                                  		;xor	al, al
  9113                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9114                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9115 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9116 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9117                                  
  9118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9119                                  
  9120                                  ;************************************************************************
  9121                                  ;*									*
  9122                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9123                                  ;*									*
  9124                                  ;************************************************************************
  9125                                  
  9126                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9127 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  9128 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9129 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9130 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9131 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9132 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9133 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9134 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9135 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9136 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9137 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9138                                  auxdrx:					
  9139 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9140                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9141                                  
  9142                                  auxbus:					
  9143 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9145                                  
  9146                                  ;************************************************************************
  9147                                  ;*									*
  9148                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9149                                  ;*									*
  9150                                  ;************************************************************************
  9151                                  
  9152                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9154 0000034F A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9155 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9156 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9157 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9158                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9159                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9160                                  		;clc
  9161 00000358 C3                      		retn
  9162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9163                                  
  9164                                  ;************************************************************************
  9165                                  ;*									*
  9166                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9167                                  ;*									*
  9168                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9169                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9170                                  ;*									*
  9171                                  ;************************************************************************
  9172                                  
  9173                                  auxstat:				
  9174 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9175                                  
  9176                                  		; fall into auxop
  9177                                  
  9178                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9179                                  
  9180                                  ;************************************************************************
  9181                                  ;*									*
  9182                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9183                                  ;*									*
  9184                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9185                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9186                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9187                                  ;*									*
  9188                                  ;************************************************************************
  9189                                  
  9190                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9191 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9192                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9193                                  					; get port number
  9194 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9195                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9196                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9197 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9198                                  
  9199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9200                                  
  9201                                  ;************************************************************************
  9202                                  ;*									*
  9203                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9204                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9205                                  ;*									*
  9206                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9207                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9208                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9209                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9210                                  ;*									*
  9211                                  ;************************************************************************
  9212                                  
  9213                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9214 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9215 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9216                                  					; zero out buffer
  9217                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9218                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9219                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9220 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9222                                  
  9223                                  ;************************************************************************
  9224                                  ;*									*
  9225                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9226                                  ;*									*
  9227                                  ;************************************************************************
  9228                                  
  9229                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9230                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9231 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9232                                  aux_loop:				
  9233 0000036B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9234                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9235 0000036E 47                      		inc	di
  9236 0000036F B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9237 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9238 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9239 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9240 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9241 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9243                                  
  9244                                  awok:					
  9245 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9246                                  					; still	more character to print
  9247                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9248                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9249                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9250 00000380 C3                      		retn
  9251                                  
  9252                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9253                                  
  9254                                  ;************************************************************************
  9255                                  ;*									*
  9256                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9257                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9258                                  ;*									*
  9259                                  ;************************************************************************
  9260                                  
  9261                                  getbx:	
  9262 00000381 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9263                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9264                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9265 00000385 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9266                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9267                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9268 00000389 C3                      		retn
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9271                                  
  9272                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9273                                  
  9274                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9275                                  ;								:
  9276                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9277                                  ;								:
  9278                                  ;								:
  9279                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9280                                  ;								:
  9281                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9282                                  ;								:
  9283                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9284                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9285                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9286                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9287                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9288                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9289                                  ;								:
  9290                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9291                                  ;								:
  9292                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9293                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9294                                  ;								:
  9295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9296                                  
  9297                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9298                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9299                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9300                                  
  9301                                  ;19/07/2019
  9302                                  ;09/03/2019
  9303                                  
  9304                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9305                                  
  9306                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9307                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9308                                  
  9309 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9310 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9311 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9312 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9313 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9314 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9315 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9316 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9317 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9318 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9319 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9320 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9321 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9322 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9323 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9324                                  
  9325                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9326                                  
  9327 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9328 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9329 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9330 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9331 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9332 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9333 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9334 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9335 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9336 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9337 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9338 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9339 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9340 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9341 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9342 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9343 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9344 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9345 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9346 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9347                                  
  9348                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9349                                  
  9350                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9351                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9352                                  
  9353                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9354                                  ;
  9355                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9356                                  ;
  9357                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9358                                  ;
  9359                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9360                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9361                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9362                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9363                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9364                                  ;
  9365                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9366                                  ;
  9367                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9368                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9369                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9370                                  ;
  9371                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9372                                  
  9373                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9374                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh

  9457                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9458                                  
  9459                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9460                                  ;
  9461                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9462                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9463                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9464                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9465                                  
  9466                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9467                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9468 00000424 FF36[F004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9469 00000428 813E[F004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9470                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9471 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9472                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9473                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80

  9485                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9486                                  years:

  9488 00000446 A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9489 00000449 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9490                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9491 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9492 0000044E 8916[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9493 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9494 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9495 00000456 0006[F504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9496 0000045A FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9497                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9498 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9499 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9500                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9501 00000464 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9502 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9503 0000046A FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9504                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9505 0000046E 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9506                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9507                                  regularyear:	
  9508                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9509 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
  9510                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9511 00000473 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9512 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9513 00000479 FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9514                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9515 0000047D 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
  9516 00000481 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9517                                  					;
  9518                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9519                                  leapyear:

  9521                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9522                                  					; change month table.
  9523                                  yeardone:

  9531 00000492 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
  9532                                  months:

  9534                                  		; 08/08/2023

  9537                                  					; dh=0

  9542                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9543                                  month_done:

  9545                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
  9546                                  					; restore month table value
  9547 000004A6 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  9548 000004A8 8A36[F504]              		mov	dh, [base_year]

  9551                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month

  9554 000004B8 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al

  9556 000004BD 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al

  9564                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
  9565                                  
  9566                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  9567                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  9568                                  		
  9569 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
  9570 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
  9571                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0

  9577                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9578                                  
  9579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9580                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9581                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9582                                  ;
  9583                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9584                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9585                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9586                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9587                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9588                                  ;
  9589                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9590                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9591                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9593                                  
  9594                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9595 000004CE E84B00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9596 000004D1 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9597                                  
  9598                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9599                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9600                                  ;
  9601                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9602                                  ;	       ----------------
  9603                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9604                                  ;
  9605                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9606                                  ;
  9607                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9608                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9609                                  ;		1,193,180
  9610                                  ;
  9611                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9612                                  ;
  9613                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9614                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9615                                  ;		59,659
  9616                                  ;
  9617                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9618                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9619                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9620                                  ;
  9621                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9622                                  ; multiply by 5
  9623                                  
  9624 000004D5 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9625 000004D7 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9626                                  					; multiply by 5
  9627 000004D9 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9628 000004DB D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9629 000004DD D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9630 000004DF D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9631 000004E1 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9632 000004E3 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9633 000004E5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9634                                  
  9635                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9636                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9637                                  
  9638 000004E6 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9639 000004E9 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9640                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9641                                  
  9642                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9643                                  		;mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9644 000004EB 93                      		xchg	bx, ax
  9645 000004EC 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9646 000004EE F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9647                                  
  9648                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9649                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9650                                  
  9651 000004F0 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9652 000004F2 B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		; extract 1/100's
  9653                                  
  9654                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9655                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9656                                  
  9657 000004F5 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9658 000004F7 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9659 000004FA 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9660 000004FC 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9661                                  noadj:					
  9662 000004FF F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9663 00000500 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9664                                  
  9665                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9666                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9667                                  
  9668 00000502 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9669 00000504 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9670 00000506 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9671 00000508 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9672 0000050B F7F1                    		div	cx
  9673 0000050D 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9674 0000050F F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9675 00000511 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9676                                  
  9677                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9678                                  
  9679                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9680                                  		;push	ax
  9681                                  		;mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9682 00000513 96                      		xchg	ax, si
  9683 00000514 AB                      		stosw
  9684                                  		;pop	ax
  9685 00000515 96                      		xchg	ax, si		; al = hours, ah = minutes
  9686 00000516 AB                      		stosw
  9687 00000517 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9688 00000519 AB                      		stosw
  9689 0000051A F8                      		clc			; [es:di] = count of days since 1-1-80
  9690                                  					;   [es:di+2] = hours
  9691                                  					;   [es:di+3] = minutes
  9692                                  					;   [es:di+4] = seconds
  9693                                  					;   [es:di+5] = hundredths of seconds
  9694 0000051B C3                      		retn
  9695                                  
  9696                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9697                                  
  9698                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9699                                  
  9700                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9701                                  ;
  9702                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9703                                  ;
  9704                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9705                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9706                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9707                                  ;
  9708                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9709                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9710                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9711                                  ;			else
  9712                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9713                                  ;		}
  9714                                  ;
  9715                                  ; USES : AX
  9716                                  ;
  9717                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9718                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9719                                  ;
  9720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9721                                  
  9722                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9723                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9724 0000051C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9725 0000051E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9726                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9727                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9728                                  					; midnight
  9729                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9730 00000520 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9731 00000525 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9732 00000527 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9733                                  					; and not flag
  9734 00000529 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9735 0000052D C3                      		retn
  9736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9737                                  
  9738                                  inc_case:				
  9739 0000052E 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9740 00000530 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9741 00000532 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9742                                  no_rollover:				
  9743 00000536 C3                      		retn
  9744

  9752                                  ; 26/05/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  9753                                  ; 23/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
  9754

  9772                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9773                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9774                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9775                                  
  9776                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9777                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9778                                  
  9779                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9780                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9781                                  
  9782                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9783                                  
  9784                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9785                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9786                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9787                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9788                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9789                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9790                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9791                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9792                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9793                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9794                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9795                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9796                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9797                                  
  9798                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9799                                  
  9800                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9801                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9802                                  ;
  9803                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9804                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9805                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9806                                  ;   else
  9807                                  ;	set slow = value
  9808                                  ;   ...
  9809                                  ;*********************************************
  9810                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9811                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9812                                  ;*	 use slow
  9813                                  ;*   else
  9814                                  ;*	 use fast
  9815                                  ;*********************************************
  9816                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9817                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9818                                  ;	use slow
  9819                                  ;   else
  9820                                  ;	use fast
  9821                                  ;   ...
  9822                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9823                                  ;
  9824                                  ;
  9825                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9826                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9827                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9828                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9829                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9830                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9831

  9910                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
