  9912                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9913                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9914                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9915                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9916                                  ;
  9917                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9918                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9919                                  
  9920                                  SetDrive:	
  9921                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9922 0000056D C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9923                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9924 00000571 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9925 00000575 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9926 00000577 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9927 0000057A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9928 0000057D 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9929 0000057F F9                      		stc
  9930                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9931 00000580 C3                      		retn
  9932                                  
  9933                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9934                                  
  9935                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9936                                  
  9937                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9938                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9939                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9940                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9941                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9943                                  
  9944                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh

  9946 00000584 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9947 00000587 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9948                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9949 0000058C 7415                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9950                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9951 0000058E 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9952                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9953                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9954 00000593 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9955                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9956 00000598 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9957                                  					; fnon_removable
  9958 0000059D 740B                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy

  9960                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9961 0000059F F7DE                    		neg	si		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:05E0h
  9962 000005A1 EB2B                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9964                                  
  9965                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9966                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9967 000005A3 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9968 000005A8 7524                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9969                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9970                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0	; Presume "I don't know"
  9971                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9972 000005AA 4E                      		dec	si ; 0 		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:05EBh
  9973                                  
  9974                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9975                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9976                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9977                                  
  9978 000005AB 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9979 000005B0 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9980 000005B2 E88112                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9981 000005B5 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9982 000005B7 E8D113                  		call	haschange
  9983 000005BA 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9984                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9985                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9986

  9992 000005C8 E82800                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access

 10026                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10027                                  
 10028                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10029                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
 10030                                  ; drive.
 10031                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
 10032                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
 10033                                  ; returns in si:
 10034                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
 10035                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
 10036                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
 10037                                  ;
 10038                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
 10039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10040                                  
 10041                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10042                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
 10043 000005F3 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
 10044 000005F6 E823FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
 10045 000005F9 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10046                                  					; get stored time
 10047 000005FD 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
 10048 000005FF 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10049 00000603 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
 10050                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10051                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0646h
 10052                                  		;mov	al, [accesscount]
 10053 00000605 7515                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
 10054 00000607 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
 10055 00000609 750C                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
 10056                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10057                                  		;inc	al
 10058                                  		;cmp	al, 5
 10059                                  		;;inc	byte [accesscount]
 10060                                  		;;cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
 10061                                  		;			; if count is less than threshold, ok
 10062                                  		;jb	short timecheck_ret
 10063                                  		;;dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
 10064                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10065                                  		;dec	al
 10066                                  		;jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
 10067                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10068 0000060B 803E[1D01]04            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 4
 10069 00000610 730A                    		jnb	short timecheck_unk
 10070 00000612 FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
 10071 00000616 C3                      		retn
 10072                                  
 10073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10074                                  
 10075                                  timepassed:
 10076 00000617 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
 10077                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
 10078 0000061A 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
 10079                                  
 10080                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
 10081                                  timecheck_unk:				
 10082 0000061C 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
 10083                                  timecheck_ret:
 10084                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10085                                  		;mov	[accesscount], al
 10086 0000061D C3                      		retn
 10087                                  
 10088                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10089                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10090                                  Err_Exitj2:
 10091 0000061E EBCD                    		jmp	short err_exitj

 10162                                  
 10163                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------
 10164                                  ; clear ids in bds table. only applied for floppies.
 10165                                  ;input:  es:di -> bds table
 10166                                  ;	assumes ds: -> Bios_Data
 10167                                  ;output: volid set to "NO NAME    "
 10168                                  ;	 vol_serial set to 0.
 10169                                  ;	 filesys_id set to "FAT12   " or "FAT16   "
 10170                                  ;	   depending on the flag fatsize in bds.
 10171                                  ;
 10172                                  ;	trashes si, cx
 10173                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------
 10174                                  
 10175                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 10176                                  ;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 10177                                  
 10178                                  ; 11/09/2023
 10179                                  ; 14/08/2023
 10180                                  ;BDS.fatsiz equ 1Fh
 10181                                  
 10182                                  clear_ids:
 10183                                  		; 11/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization & BugFix)
 10184 00000667 268A451F                		mov	al, [es:di+1Fh] ; mov al,[es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10185                                  clear_ids_x:	; 11/09/2023		
 10186                                   		; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:05D9h)
 10187 0000066B 57                      		push	di
 10188 0000066C 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx		; no serial number
 10189 0000066E 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10190 00000672 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10191                                  
 10192                                  		; BUGBUG - there's a lot in common here and with
 10193                                  		; mov_media_ids.. see if we can save some space by
 10194                                  		; merging them... jgl
 10195                                  
 10196                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10197                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10198 00000676 B10B                    		mov	cl, 11 ; cx = 11		
 10199                                  
 10200                                  		;mov	si, offset vol_no_name ; "NO NAME    "
 10201 00000678 BE[1505]                		mov	si, vol_no_name	; 19/10/2022
 10202 0000067B 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10203 0000067E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10204                                  		
 10205                                  		; 11/09/2023 (BugFix, DI is not start addr of BDS structure here)
 10206                                  		;;test	byte [es:di+BDS.fatsiz], fbig
 10207                                  		; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:05EFh)
 10208                                  		;test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 40h
 10209                                  
 10210                                  			; ! NOTE - 11/08/2023 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS bugfix)
 10211                                  			; Microsoft/IBM code has a bug here because the BDS's
 10212                                  			; .volid and .filesys_id fields will be reset
 10213                                  			; (to their default text) according to 'BDS.fatsiz' flags
 10214                                  			; at the BDS offset 31 but current (this) code checks flags
 10215                                  			; at ES:DI+31 while DI points the BDS offset 86!?
 10216                                  			;
 10217                                  			; Correct Code:
 10218                                  			; ;test byte [ES:31],40h or [ES:BDS.fatsiz],fbig
 10219                                  			; 11/09/2023
 10220                                  			; (before 'rep movsb') 'mov al,[es:di+BDS.Fatsiz]' and then
 10221                                  			; (after 'rep movsb') 'test al,fbig' (AL is free/proper to use here)	
 10222                                  			;
 10223                                  			; Same BUG is existing in PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:06C3h
 10224                                  			; and in Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0E1Ah as 'test byte [es:di+59],20h'
 10225                                  			; (PCDOS 7.1 BUG note: 26/06/2023)
 10226                                  			;
 10227                                  			; (Why this bug did not affect MSDOS and PCDOS 7.x applications:
 10228                                  			; 'clear_ids' is used for floppy disks only and the default
 10229                                  			; option of 'clear_ids' is FAT12 volid and filesys_id text
 10230                                  			; when the flag bit has wrong value for FAT16/40h or FAT32/20h.)
 10231

 10251                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10252                                  
 10253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10254                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
 10255                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
 10256                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
 10257                                  ;	    for all other cases,
 10258                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
 10259                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
 10260                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
 10261                                  ;
 10262                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
 10263                                  ;
 10264                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
 10265                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
 10266                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
 10267                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
 10268                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
 10269                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
 10270                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
 10271                                  ;
 10272                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
 10273                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
 10274                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
 10275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10276                                  
 10277                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
 10278                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable

 10281 0000069A E99A00                  		jmp	getret_exit

 10442                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10443                                  
 10444                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10445                                  
 10446                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10447                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10448                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10449                                  ;
 10450                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10451                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10452                                  
 10453                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10454                                  
 10455                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 10456                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE:06C3h)
 10457                                  
 10458                                  readbootsec:	
 10459 0000074C B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10460 0000074E B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10461 00000751 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 10462 00000754 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 10463 00000756 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10464                                  
 10465                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10466                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10467                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10468                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10469                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10470                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10471                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10472                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10473                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10474                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10475                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10476                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10477                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10478                                  		; informations
 10479                                  
 10480                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10481                                  
 10482                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10483                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10484                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10485                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10486                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10487                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10488                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10489                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10490                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10491                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10492                                  
 10493                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10494 00000758 A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10495 0000075B 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10496 0000075D 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10497                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10498 0000075F 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10499 00000761 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10500                                  					; no need for nop
 10501 00000763 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10502 00000765 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10503 00000767 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10504 0000076C 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10505                                  
 10506                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10507                                  ;
 10508                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10509                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10510                                  ;;
 10511                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10512                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10513                                  ;;
 10514                                  ;;check_signature:
 10515                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10516                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10517                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if singled sided medium.
 10518                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10519                                  
 10520                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10521                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10522                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10523                                  
 10524                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10525                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:
 10526 0000076E A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10527                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10528 00000771 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10529 00000772 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10530 00000774 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10531 00000776 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10532 00000777 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10533                                  
 10534                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10535                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10536                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10537                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10538                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10539                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10540                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10541                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10542                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10543                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10544                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10545                                  
 10546                                  checksinglesided:
 10547                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10548                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10549                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10550 00000779 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10551 0000077B 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10552 0000077D A801                    		test	al, 1
 10553 0000077F 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10554 00000781 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10555 00000787 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10556 00000789 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10557 0000078E 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10558                                  
 10559                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10560                                  
 10561                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10562 00000790 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10563                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10564 00000795 EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10566                                  
 10567                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10568 00000797 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10569                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10570                                  movbpb_ret:
 10571                                  gooddsk:				
 10572 00000798 F8                      		clc
 10573                                  err_ret:
 10574 00000799 C3                      		retn
 10575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10576                                  
 10577                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10578                                  ;err_ret:				
 10579                                  		;retn

 10581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10582                                  
 10583                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10585                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10586                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10587                                  ;
 10588                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10589                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10590                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10591                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10592                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10593                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10597                                  
 10598                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10599                                  movbpb:	
 10600 0000079A 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10601                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10602                                  					; sectors per unit
 10603 0000079E 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10604                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10605                                  					; number of directory entries
 10606 000007A2 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10607                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10608                                  					; size of drive
 10609 000007A6 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10610                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10611                                  					; media	descriptor
 10612 000007AA A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10613                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10614                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10615 000007AD 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10616                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10617                                  					; sectors per track
 10618 000007B1 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10619                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10620                                  					; number of heads
 10621 000007B5 803E[0205]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10622 000007BA 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10623 000007BC E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10624 000007BF 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10625 000007C1 C606[0205]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10626                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10627 000007C6 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10628 000007CB 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10629 000007CD E8B511                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 10630                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10631                                  		; cf = 0
 10632                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10633                                  		;clc
 10634 000007D0 C3                      		retn
 10635                                  
 10636                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10637                                  
 10638                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10639                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10640                                  ;by es:di.
 10641                                  
 10642                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10643                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10644                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10645                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10646                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10647                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10648                                  
 10649                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10650                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10651 000007D1 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10652                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10653                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10654 000007D6 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10655 000007D8 51                      		push	cx
 10656 000007D9 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10657                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10658 000007DD 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10659 000007E1 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10660                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10661 000007E5 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10662 000007E9 57                      		push	di
 10663 000007EA 56                      		push	si
 10664 000007EB B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10665 000007EE BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10666                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10667                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL

 10669 000007F4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10670                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10671                                  		; 10/12/2022

 10674                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID

 10677 00000800 5E                      		pop	si
 10678 00000801 5F                      		pop	di
 10679 00000802 59                      		pop	cx

 10691                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10692                                  
 10693                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10694                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10695                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10696                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10697                                  ; output:
 10698                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10699                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10700                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10701                                  
 10702                                  readfat:	
 10703                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10705 00000806 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10706 00000808 B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10707                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10708 0000080B E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10709 0000080E 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10710 00000810 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10711                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10712 00000812 C3                      		retn
 10713                                  
 10714                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10715                                  
 10716                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10717                                  
 10718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10719                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10720                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10721                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10722                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10723                                  ;		dh has head
 10724                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10725                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10726                                  ;
 10727                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10728                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10729                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10730                                  ;
 10731                                  ;		carry set
 10732                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10733                                  ;
 10734                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10736                                  
 10737                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10738                                  
 10739                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10740                                  read_sector:	
 10741 00000813 55                      		push	bp
 10742 00000814 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10743 00000817 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10744 0000081B BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10745                                  rd_ret:					
 10746 0000081E 06                      		push	es
 10747 0000081F 1E                      		push	ds
 10748 00000820 07                      		pop	es
 10749 00000821 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10750 00000824 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10751                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10752                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10753                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10754 00000826 07                      		pop	es
 10755 00000827 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10756                                  rd_rty:					
 10757 00000829 E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10758 0000082C 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10759 0000082E 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10760                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10761                                  					; fnon_removable
 10762 00000833 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10763 00000835 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10764 0000083A 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10765 0000083C 50                      		push	ax
 10766 0000083D 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10767 0000083E C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10768                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10769                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10770                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10771                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10772 00000842 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10773 00000844 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10774                                  		; 
 10775 00000847 1F                      		pop	ds
 10776 00000848 A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10777 0000084B 58                      		pop	ax
 10778                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10779 0000084C 06                      		push	es
 10780 0000084D 1E                      		push	ds
 10781 0000084E 07                      		pop	es
 10782 0000084F B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10783 00000852 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10784                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10785                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10786                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10787 00000854 07                      		pop	es
 10788 00000855 9C                      		pushf
 10789 00000856 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10790 0000085B 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10791 0000085D 50                      		push	ax
 10792 0000085E A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10793 00000861 1E                      		push	ds
 10794 00000862 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10795 00000866 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10796 00000869 1F                      		pop	ds
 10797 0000086A 58                      		pop	ax
 10798                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10799 0000086B 9D                      		popf
 10800 0000086C 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10801 0000086E EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10803                                  
 10804                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10805 00000870 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10806                                  					; return error
 10807 00000872 F9                      		stc
 10808                                  
 10809                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10810                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10811                                  
 10812                                  okret2:					
 10813 00000873 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10814 00000877 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed

 10821 00000884 5D                      		pop	bp

 10846 000008A4 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10847 000008A6 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10848                                  exitjx:					
 10849                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10850                                  		; cf = 0
 10851                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10852                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10853 000008AA C3                      		retn

 10915                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10916                                  
 10917                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10918                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10919                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10920                                  
 10921                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10922                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10923                                  ;
 10924                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10925                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10926                                  
 10927                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10928                                  checksingle:		
 10929 000008D5 50                      		push	ax
 10930 000008D6 53                      		push	bx
 10931 000008D7 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10932                                  
 10933                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10934                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10935                                  
 10936 000008DB F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10937 000008DE 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10938 000008E0 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10939                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10940 000008E3 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10941                                  
 10942                                  
 10943                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10944                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10945                                  
 10946 000008E5 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10947                                  					; get physical drive number
 10948 000008E9 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10949 000008EA 57                      		push	di
 10950 000008EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10951                                  scan_list:				
 10952 000008EF 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10953 000008F3 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10954 000008F5 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10955 000008F7 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10956 000008FB 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10957 000008FD 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10958 00000901 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10959 00000902 07                      		pop	es
 10960 00000903 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10961                                  
 10962                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10963                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10964                                  ; in this case.
 10965 00000907 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10966 0000090C 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10967                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10968 0000090E 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10969 00000913 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10970 00000915 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10971                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10972                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10973 00000919 06                      		push	es
 10974 0000091A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10975 0000091E 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10976                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10977                                  					; set up sdsb
 10978 00000922 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10979 00000923 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10981                                  
 10982                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10983                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10984                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10985                                  
 10986                                  not_fsetowner:

 10988 0000092A 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10989 0000092C 50                      		push	ax
 10990 0000092D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10991 00000931 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10992 00000933 06                      		push	es
 10993 00000934 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10994 00000938 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10995                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10996                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10997 0000093D 07                      		pop	es
 10998 0000093E 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10999 00000940 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 11000 00000941 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 11001                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 11002 00000943 E8690E                  		call	swpdsk
 11003 00000946 EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 11004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11005                                  
 11006                                  scan_skip:	
 11007 00000948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]

 11009                                  					; go to	next bds
 11010 0000094B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 11011 0000094E 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 11012 00000950 F9                      		stc
 11013 00000951 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 11014 00000952 07                      		pop	es
 11015                                  
 11016                                  singleret:

 11022

 11037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11038                                  
 11039                                  ; 15/10/52022
 11040                                  
 11041                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11042                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11043                                  ;
 11044                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11045                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11046                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11047                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11048                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11049                                  ;	ds = cs
 11050                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11051                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11052                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11053                                  ;
 11054                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11055                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 11056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11057                                  
 11058                                  diskrd:	
 11059                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 11060                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11061 0000095E C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 11062                                  
 11063                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11064                                  
 11065                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11066                                  diskio:
 11067 00000963 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 11068 00000965 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 11069 00000969 E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 11070 0000096C 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 11071 00000970 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 11072                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 11073 00000973 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 11074                                  
 11075                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 11076                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 11077                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 11078                                  
 11079 00000975 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 11080                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 11081                                  					; unformatted_media

 11493                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------

 11495                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.

 11503                                  
 11504                                  do_norm:				
 11505 00000BB3 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11506 00000BB6 EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11508                                  
 11509                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11510                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11511                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11512                                  
 11513                                  doverify:				
 11514 00000BB8 58                      		pop	ax
 11515 00000BB9 50                      		push	ax
 11516 00000BBA B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11517 00000BBC E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11518 00000BBF 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11519                                  
 11520                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11521                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11522                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11523                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11524                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11525                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11526                                  
 11527 00000BC1 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11528 00000BC4 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11529 00000BC6 FF0E[2C05]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11530 00000BCA 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11531 00000BCC E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11532 00000BCF EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11534                                  
 11535                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11536 00000BD1 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11537 00000BD4 FF0E[2A05]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11538 00000BD8 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11540                                  
 11541                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11542                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11543                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11544                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11545                                  
 11546                                  dskerr:					
 11547 00000BDA 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11548 00000BDF 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11549 00000BE1 E80B0D                  		call	checkio
 11550                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11551 00000BE4 803E[2E05]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11552 00000BE9 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11553 00000BEB BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11554 00000BEE C606[2E05]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11555                                  dochkagain:				
 11556 00000BF3 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11557                                  dskerr0:				
 11558 00000BF6 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11559 00000BF8 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11560                                  					; fnon_removable
 11561 00000BFD 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11562 00000BFF 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11563 00000C02 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11564                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11565 00000C04 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11566 00000C07 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11567 00000C09 C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11568                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11569                                  dskerr1:				
 11570 00000C0F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11571                                  		;jmp	retry
 11572                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11573 00000C10 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11575                                  
 11576                                  write_fault_err:			
 11577 00000C13 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11578                                  					; for write fault error.
 11579 00000C16 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11580                                  
 11581                                  		; fall into harderr
 11582                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11583                                  
 11584                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11585                                  
 11586                                  harderr:				
 11587 00000C18 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11588                                  harderr2:				
 11589 00000C1B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11590                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11591 00000C20 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11592 00000C24 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11593                                  
 11594                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11595                                  
 11596                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11597                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11598 00000C28 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11599                                  
 11600                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11601                                  
 11602                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11603                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11604                                  
 11605                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11606                                  normspeed:
 11607 00000C2B 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11608 00000C30 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11609 00000C32 06                      		push	es
 11610 00000C33 50                      		push	ax
 11611 00000C34 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11612 00000C37 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11613 00000C3B 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11614 00000C3F 58                      		pop	ax
 11615 00000C40 07                      		pop	es
 11616 00000C41 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11617 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 11618 00000C45 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11619 00000C49 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11620                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11621 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 11622 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 11623                                  
 11624                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11625                                  
 11626                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11627                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11628                                  
 11629                                  fastspeed:		
 11630 00000C50 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11631                                  					; ftoobig
 11632 00000C55 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11633 00000C57 06                      		push	es
 11634 00000C58 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11635 00000C5C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11636 00000C5E 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11637 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11638 00000C63 C3                      		retn
 11639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11640                                  
 11641                                  notready:				
 11642 00000C64 F9                      		stc
 11643 00000C65 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11644 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 11645                                  
 11646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11647                                  
 11648                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11649                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11650                                  
 11651                                  maperror:	
 11652 00000C68 51                      		push	cx
 11653 00000C69 06                      		push	es
 11654 00000C6A 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11655 00000C6B 07                      		pop	es
 11656 00000C6C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11657 00000C6E A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11658                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11659 00000C71 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11660                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11661 00000C74 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11662 00000C77 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11663                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11664                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11665                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11666 00000C79 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11667                                  					; get translation
 11668                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11669                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11670 00000C7C 07                      		pop	es
 11671 00000C7D 59                      		pop	cx
 11672 00000C7E F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11673 00000C7F C3                      		retn
 11674                                  
 11675                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11676                                  
 11677                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11678                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11679                                  
 11680                                  set_tim:		
 11681 00000C80 50                      		push	ax
 11682 00000C81 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11683                                  
 11684                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11685                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11686                                  
 11687 00000C84 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11688 00000C88 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11689 00000C8A 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11690                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11691                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11692 00000C8E 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11693                                  setaccess:				
 11694 00000C90 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11695 00000C95 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11696 00000C99 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11697                                  done_set:				
 11698 00000C9D F8                      		clc
 11699                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11700 00000C9E 58                      		pop	ax
 11701 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 11702                                  
 11703                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11704                                  
 11705                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11706                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11707                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11708                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11709                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11710                                  
 11711                                  again:	
 11712 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11713 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11714 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11715                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11716 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11717 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 11718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11719                                  
 11720                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11721 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11722 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11723

 11734                                  ;
 11735                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11736                                  ;
 11737                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11738                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11739                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11740                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11741                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11742                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11743                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11744                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11748

 11752 00000CAD 00                      		db 0
 11753

 11755                                  %if 0
 11756                                  
 11757                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11758                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11759                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	;gh ReadTrack
 11760                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11761                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11762                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11763                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11765                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11766                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11767                                  
 11768                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11769                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11770                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11771                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11772                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11773                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11774                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11775                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11776                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11777                                  
 11778                                  %endif

 11781 00000CAE 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11782 00000CAF [190D]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11783 00000CB1 [5B0F]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11784 00000CB3 [FB0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11785 00000CB5 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11786 00000CB7 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 11803                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11804                                  ;
 11805                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11806                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 11807                                  ; Added for 5.00

 11810 00000CD2 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS

 11812 00000CD4 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 11813 00000CD5 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 11814 00000CD6 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 11815 00000CD7 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK

 11817 00000CD9 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID

 11820 00000CDC 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
