 11828                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11829                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11830                                  ;
 11831                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11832                                  ;
 11833                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11834                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11835                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11836                                  ;
 11837                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11838                                  
 11839                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11840                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11841                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11842 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11843 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 11844 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11845 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11846                                  					; RAWIO
 11847 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11848 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 11849 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11850                                  
 11851                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11852                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11853                                  
 11854                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11855 00000CF1 BE[AE0C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11856                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11857                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11858 00000CF4 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11859 00000CF6 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11860                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11861 00000CF8 BE[C10C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11862                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11863                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11864                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11865 00000CFB 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11866 00000CFD 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11867 00000CFF 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11868 00000D02 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11869 00000D04 98                      		cbw
 11870 00000D05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11871 00000D07 46                      		inc	si
 11872 00000D08 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11873 00000D0A 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11874                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11875 00000D0D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11876                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11877                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11878 00000D12 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11879 00000D14 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11881                                  
 11882                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11883                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11884                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11885 00000D15 5A                      		pop	dx
 11886                                  
 11887                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11888 00000D16 E9BCF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11890                                  
 11891                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11892                                  
 11893                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11894                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11895                                  ;
 11896                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11897                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11898                                  ;
 11899                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11900                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11901                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11902                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11903                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11904                                  
 11905                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11906                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11907                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11908                                  
 11909 00000D19 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11910 00000D1D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11911                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11912 00000D20 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11913 00000D24 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11914 00000D27 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11915 00000D2B 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11916                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11917 00000D2E 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11918 00000D31 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11919 00000D35 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11920 00000D38 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11921 00000D3A 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11922                                  					
 11923                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11924 00000D3D 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11925 00000D40 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11926                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11927 00000D43 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11928 00000D45 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11929 00000D46 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11930                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11931                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11932                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11933 00000D4B E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11934 00000D4E E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch

 12126                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12127                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12128                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12129                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12130                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12131                                  ;
 12132                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12133                                  ;
 12134                                  ; output:
 12135                                  ;	for status call:
 12136                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12137                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12138                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12139                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12140                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12141                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12142                                  ;
 12143                                  ;	for format track:
 12144                                  ;		carry set if error
 12145                                  ;
 12146                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12147                                  
 12148                                  ; 16/03/2019

 12389                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 12390                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register

 12395 00000F68 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header

 12397 00000F70 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]

 12401 00000F7E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 12402 00000F82 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]

 12413                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12414                                  
 12415                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12416                                  
 12417                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12418                                  ;
 12419                                  ; TrackIo:
 12420                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12421                                  ;
 12422                                  ;   input:
 12423                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12424                                  ;		  3 = write
 12425                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12426                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12427                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12428                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12429                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12430                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12431                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12432                                  ;
 12433                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12434                                  
 12435                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12436                                  		
 12437                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12438                                  TrackIo:	
 12439                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12440 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12441 00000F93 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12442 00000F96 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12443                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12444 00000F9B 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12445 00000F9D 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12446 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 12447 00000F9F E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12448 00000FA2 59                      		pop	cx
 12449 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax
 12450                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12451 00000FA4 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12452 00000FA7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12453 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12454 00000FAB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12455                                  
 12456                                  		; WE WANT:
 12457                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12458                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12459                                  		
 12460 00000FAD BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12461                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12462 00000FB0 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12463                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12464                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12465 00000FB5 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12466                                  		
 12467 00000FB7 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12468                                  ionextsector:				
 12469 00000FB9 51                      		push	cx
 12470 00000FBA 52                      		push	dx
 12471 00000FBB 46                      		inc	si
 12472 00000FBC 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12473                                  					; the track table
 12474 00000FBD AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12475 00000FBE A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12476                                  
 12477                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12478                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12479                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12480                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12481                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12482                                  		
 12483                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12484 00000FC1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12485                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12486                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12487 00000FC6 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12488                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12490                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12491                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12492 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12493 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12494 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12495 00000FD5 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12496 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 12497 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 12498 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 12499 00000FDB C3                      		retn
 12500                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12501                                  
 12502                                  IoRemovable:				
 12503 00000FDC AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12504                                  					; table	and save it
 12505 00000FDD 50                      		push	ax
 12506 00000FDE 56                      		push	si
 12507 00000FDF 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12508 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 12509 00000FE1 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12510                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12511 00000FE5 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]

 12513 00000FEC 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12514 00000FEF 58                      		pop	ax
 12515 00000FF0 1F                      		pop	ds

 12517 00000FF3 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12518 00000FF6 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk

 12520                                  					; sector size
 12521 00000FFA 58                      		pop	ax

 12524                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize

 12526 00000FFD B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12527 00001000 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl

 12538                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12539                                  NoNeedDone:
 12540 00001012 F8                      		clc
 12541                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12542 00001013 C3                      		retn

 12544                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12545                                  
 12546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12547                                  ;
 12548                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12549                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12550                                  ; are permissible.
 12551                                  ;
 12552                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12553                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12554                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12555                                  ;

 12564                                  ;		retn

 12586                                  ;
 12587                                  ; SetDASD
 12588                                  ;
 12589                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12590                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12591                                  ;
 12592                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12593                                  ;
 12594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12595                                  
 12596                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12597                                  SetDasd:
 12598 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12599                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12600 00001019 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12601                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12602 0000101B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12603                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12604                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12605 00001020 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12606                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12607 00001022 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12608                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12609                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12610                                  DoSetDasd:
 12611 00001027 C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12612 0000102C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12613 00001031 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12614                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12615 00001033 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12616 00001037 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12617                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12618                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12619 0000103A 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12620 0000103C 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12621                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12622                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12623                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12624 0000103F B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12625                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12626                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12628                                  
 12629                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12630                                  
 12631                                  GotBig:
 12632                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12633                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12635 00001044 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12636 00001049 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12637                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12638                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12639                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12640                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12641 0000104B 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12642 0000104C C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12643                                  DoSet:

 12646

 12648                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12650 00001055 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12651                                  
 12652 00001057 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12653                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12654                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12655                                  
 12656 0000105B C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12657                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12658 0000105F 5E                      		pop	si
 12659 00001060 1F                      		pop	ds
 12660 00001061 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12661 00001063 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12662 00001067 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12663                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12664                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12665 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12666 0000106D 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12667 00001071 C3                      		retn
 12668                                  
 12669                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12670                                  
 12671                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12672                                  
 12673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12674                                  ;
 12675                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12676                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12677                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12678                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12679                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12680                                  ;
 12681                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12682                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12683                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12684                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12685                                  ;
 12686                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12687                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12688                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12689                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12690                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12691                                  ;
 12692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12693                                  
 12694                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12695                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12696 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 12697 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 12698                                  
 12699                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12700                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12701                                  
 12702 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12703 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12704 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12705 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12706 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12707 00001084 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12709                                  
 12710                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12711 00001086 06                      		push	es
 12712 00001087 56                      		push	si
 12713                                  
 12714                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12715                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12716 00001088 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12717 0000108A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12718                                  
 12719 0000108C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12720                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12721                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12722 00001091 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12723 00001095 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12724                                  
 12725                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12726                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12727                                  
 12728 00001099 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12729 0000109E 5E                      		pop	si
 12730 0000109F 07                      		pop	es
 12731                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12732 000010A0 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12733 000010A4 49                      		dec	cx
 12734 000010A5 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12735 000010A8 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12736 000010AA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12737 000010AC 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12738 000010AE 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12739 000010B2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12740 000010B6 06                      		push	es
 12741 000010B7 1E                      		push	ds
 12742 000010B8 56                      		push	si
 12743 000010B9 57                      		push	di
 12744 000010BA B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12745 000010BC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12746                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12747 000010BE 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12748 000010C0 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12749 000010C5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12750 000010C7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12751                                  
 12752                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12753                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12754 000010C8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12755 000010CA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12756 000010CC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12757                                  
 12758 000010CD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12759                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12760                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12761 000010D2 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12762 000010D6 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12763                                  
 12764                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12765                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12766                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12767                                  		;mov	es, si
 12768 000010DA 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12769                                  
 12770                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12771 000010DB 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12772                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12773 000010E0 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12774 000010E5 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12775                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12776 000010EA 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12777                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12778 000010EC A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12779 000010EF EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12781                                  
 12782                                  FormaStatErr:
 12783                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12784 000010F1 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12785                                  				
 12786 000010F3 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12787                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12788 000010F6 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12789 000010F8 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12790 000010FB 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12791                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12792                                  		;dec	al
 12793                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12794 000010FD 48                      		dec	ax
 12795                                  		; al = 2
 12796                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12797                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12799                                  
 12800                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:

 12869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12870                                  ;
 12871                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12872                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12873                                  ;
 12874                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12875                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12876                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12877                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12878                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12879                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12880                                  ;
 12881                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12882                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12883                                  ;
 12884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12885                                  
 12886                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12887                                  ToRom:

 12941                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12942                                  
 12943                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12944                                  ;
 12945                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12946                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12947                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12948                                  ;
 12949                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12950                                  
 12951                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12952                                  ioctl_getown:
 12953 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12954 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12955                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12956 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12957                                  ownloop:				
 12958 0000117F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12959 00001183 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12960                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12961 00001185 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12962                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12963                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12964 0000118A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12965                                  getnextBDS:				
 12966 0000118C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12967 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12969                                  
 12970                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12971                                  ;
 12972                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12973                                  ; in al to al.
 12974                                  ;
 12975                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12984 0000119C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12985                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12986                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12987                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12988                                  
 12989                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12992                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12993                                  ;

 13001                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13010                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13011                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13012                                  		; cf=0
 13013                                  		;clc

 13068                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13069                                  ;	get media id
 13070                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13071                                  ;
 13072                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13073                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13074                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13075                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13076                                  ;
 13077                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13078                                  ;
 13079                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13080                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13081                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13082                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13083                                  ;
 13084                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13085                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13086                                  ;
 13087                                  ; LOGIC:
 13088                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13089                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13090                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13091                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13092                                  ;
 13093                                  ; {
 13094                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13095                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13096                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13097                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13098                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13099                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13100                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13101                                  ;		};
 13102                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13103                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13104                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13105                                  ;		};
 13106                                  ;	else
 13107                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13108                                  ;
 13109                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13110                                  
 13111                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13112                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13113                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13114                                  
 13115                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13116                                  GetMediaId:
 13117 000011E5 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13118 000011E8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13119 000011EC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13120 000011F1 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13121 000011F4 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13122                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13123 000011F6 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13124                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13125 000011FB 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13126                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13127 000011FD BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13128 00001200 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13129                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13130                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13131 00001203 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13132 00001205 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13133 00001209 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13134                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13135 0000120D 46                      		inc	si
 13136                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13137                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13138 0000120E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13139 00001211 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13140                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13141                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13142 00001214 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13143                                  	
 13144                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13145                                  		; cf = 0
 13146                                  		;clc
 13147                                  
 13148 00001216 C3                      		retn
 13149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13150                                  
 13151                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13152 00001217 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13153 00001219 F9                      		stc
 13154                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13155 0000121A C3                      		retn
 13156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13157                                  
 13158                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13159                                  
 13160                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13161                                  ;  set media id
 13162                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13163                                  
 13164                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13165                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13166                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13167                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13168                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13169                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13170                                  ;
 13171                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13172                                  ;
 13173                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13174                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13175                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13176                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13177                                  ;
 13178                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13179                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13180                                  ;
 13181                                  ; logic:
 13182                                  ;
 13183                                  ; {
 13184                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13185                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13186                                  ;	BootIo;
 13187                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13188                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13189                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13190                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13191                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13192                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13193                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13194                                  ;		};
 13195                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13196                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13197                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13198                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13199                                  ;		};
 13200                                  ;	else
 13201                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13202                                  ;
 13203                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13204                                  
 13205                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13206                                  SetMediaId:
 13207 0000121B E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13208 0000121E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13209                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13210 00001222 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13211 00001224 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13212 00001229 52                      		push	dx
 13213 0000122A E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13214 0000122D 5A                      		pop	dx
 13215 0000122E 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13216                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13217 00001230 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13218                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13219 00001235 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13220 00001237 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13221                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13222 0000123C 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13223 0000123E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13224 0000123F 57                      		push	di
 13225 00001240 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13226 00001241 07                      		pop	es
 13227 00001242 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13228 00001245 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13229 00001249 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13230 0000124C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13231 0000124F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13232                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13233                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13234 00001252 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13235 00001254 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13236 00001255 1F                      		pop	ds
 13237 00001256 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13238 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 13239 00001258 E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13240 0000125B 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13241 0000125D C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13242 00001262 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13243 00001265 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13244                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13245                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13246 0000126A C3                      		retn
 13247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13248                                  
 13249                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13250 0000126B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13251 0000126D F9                      		stc
 13252                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13253 0000126E C3                      		retn

 13255                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13256                                  
 13257                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13258                                  
 13259                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13260                                  ;	BootIo
 13261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13262                                  ;
 13263                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13264                                  ;
 13265                                  ; input :
 13266                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13267                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13268                                  ;
 13269                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13270                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13271                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13272                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13273                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13274                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13275                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13276                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13277                                  ;
 13278                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13279                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13280                                  ;
 13281                                  ; logic:
 13282                                  ;
 13283                                  ; {
 13284                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13285                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13286                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13287                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13288                                  ; }
 13289                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13290                                  
 13291                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13292                                  BootIo:	
 13293 0000126F 06                      		push	es
 13294 00001270 57                      		push	di
 13295 00001271 53                      		push	bx
 13296 00001272 1E                      		push	ds
 13297 00001273 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13298                                  
 13299                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13300                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13301                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13302                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13303                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13304                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13305                                  
 13306 00001274 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13307 00001277 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13308 00001279 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13309 0000127D B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13310 00001280 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13311 00001283 5B                      		pop	bx
 13312 00001284 5F                      		pop	di
 13313 00001285 07                      		pop	es
 13314 00001286 C3                      		retn
 13315                                  
 13316                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13317                                  
 13318                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13319                                  
 13320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13321                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13322                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13323                                  ;
 13324                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13325                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13326                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13327                                  ; history in the flags.
 13328                                  ;
 13329                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13330                                  ;
 13331                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13332                                  ;
 13333                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13334                                  ;
 13335                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13336                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13337                                  ;
 13338                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13339                                  
 13340                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13341 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13342 0000128B 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13343 0000128D 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13344                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13345 0000128F 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13346                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13347                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13348 00001294 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13349 00001296 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13350 0000129B 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13351 0000129D E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13352 000012A0 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13353                                  
 13354                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13355                                  
 13356 000012A2 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13357 000012A4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13358                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13359                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13360 000012A6 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13361 000012A8 53                      		push	bx
 13362 000012A9 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13363                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13364                                  					; physical drive
 13365 000012AC E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13366 000012AF 5B                      		pop	bx
 13367                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13368 000012B0 C3                      		retn
 13369                                  
 13370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13371                                  
 13372                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13373                                  
 13374                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13375                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13376                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13377                                  ;
 13378                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13379                                  ;
 13380                                  ; INPUT :
 13381                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13382                                  ;
 13383                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13384                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13385                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13386                                  
 13387                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13388                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13389 000012B1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13390 000012B5 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13391                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13392                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13393 000012B8 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13394                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13395 000012BA 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13396                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13397                                  					; unformatted_media
 13398 000012BF 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13399 000012C1 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13400                                  
 13401                                  GafDone:				
 13402 000012C3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13403 000012C6 C3                      		retn
 13404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13405                                  
 13406                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13407                                  
 13408                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13409                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13410                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13411                                  ;
 13412                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13413                                  ;
 13414                                  ; input :
 13415                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13416                                  ;
 13417                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13418                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13419                                  
 13420                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13421                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13422 000012C7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13423 000012CB C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13424                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13425 000012CE 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13426                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13427                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13428 000012D3 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13429 000012D7 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13430                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13431 000012D9 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13432                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13433                                  					; unformatted_media
 13434                                  saf_Done:				
 13435 000012DE C3                      		retn
 13436                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13437                                  
 13438                                  ; 16/10/2022
