 13440                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13441                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13442                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13443                                  ;
 13444                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13445                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13446                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13447                                  ;
 13448                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13449                                  
 13450                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13451                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13452 000012DF 06                      		push	es
 13453 000012E0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13454 000012E4 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13455                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13456                                  
 13457                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13458                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13459                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13460                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13461                                  
 13462 000012E8 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13463                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13464 000012EA 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13465                                  ioctl_support:
 13466 000012EC 0E                      		push	cs
 13467 000012ED 07                      		pop	es
 13468                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13469                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13470 000012EE B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13471                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13472 000012F1 BF[D20C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13473                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13474                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13475 000012F4 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13476 000012F6 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13477 000012F8 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13478 000012FA B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13479                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13480                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13481                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13482                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13483                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13485                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13486 000012FD 07                      		pop	es
 13487                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13488                                  		; cf = 0
 13489                                  		;clc
 13490 000012FE C3                      		retn
 13491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13492                                  nosupport:
 13493 000012FF 07                      		pop	es
 13494 00001300 E9D2ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13495                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13496                                  
 13497                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13498                                  
 13499                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13500                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13501                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13502                                  ;
 13503                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13504                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13505                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13506                                  ;	    drive)
 13507                                  ;
 13508                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13509                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13510                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13511                                  ;
 13512                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13513                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13514                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13515                                  ;
 13516                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13517                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13518                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13519                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13520                                  ;
 13521                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13522                                  ;
 13523                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13524                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13525                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13526                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13527                                  ; 
 13528                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13529                                  
 13530                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13531                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13532 00001303 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13533 00001307 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13534                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13535                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13536 0000130A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13537 0000130C 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13538                                  		;
 13539 0000130E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13540                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13541                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13542                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13543 00001312 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13544                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13545 00001314 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13546 00001316 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13547 00001318 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13548                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13549 0000131A FEC8                    		dec	al
 13550 0000131C 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13551 0000131E 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13552 00001320 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13553 00001322 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13554 00001324 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13555 00001326 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13556 00001328 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13557                                  GotMediaType:				
 13558 0000132A 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13559                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13560                                  		; cf = 0
 13561                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13562 0000132D C3                      		retn
 13563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13564                                  
 13565                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13566 0000132E 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13567 00001331 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13568 00001333 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13569 00001335 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13570 00001338 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13571                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13572 0000133A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13573                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13574 0000133C B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13575 0000133E F9                      		stc
 13576 0000133F C3                      		retn
 13577                                  
 13578                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13579                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13580                                  		;db    0
 13581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13582                                  
 13583                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13584                                  
 13585                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13586                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13587                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13588                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13589                                  
 13590                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13591                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13592                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13593                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13594                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13595                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13596                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13597                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13598                                  ;
 13599                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13600                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13601                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13602                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13603                                  ;
 13604                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13605                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13606                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13607                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13608                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13609                                  ;
 13610                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13611                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13612                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13613                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13614                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13615                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13616                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13617                                  
 13618                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13619                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13620                                  
 13621                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13622                                  
 13623                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13624 00001340 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13625 00001343 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13626 00001345 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13627 00001348 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13628                                  
 13629                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13630                                  
 13631 0000134A 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13632 0000134D 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13633 0000134F 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13634 00001352 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13635 00001354 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13637                                  
 13638                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13639 00001357 CF                      		iret
 13640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13641                                  
 13642                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13643 00001358 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13644 00001359 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13645                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13646                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13647                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13648 0000135B 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13649                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13650                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13651                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13652                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13653                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13654                                  		
 13655                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13656                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13657 00001360 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13658                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13659 00001364 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13660                                  
 13661                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13662                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13663                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13664                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13665                                  		
 13666                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13667                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13668 00001368 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13669 0000136C A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13670                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13671                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13672 0000136F 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13673 00001373 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13674                                  
 13675 00001377 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13676                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13677                                  		;pop	bx
 13678 00001378 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13679                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13680 00001379 58                      		pop	ax
 13681                                  i2f_iret:
 13682 0000137A CF                      		iret
 13683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13684                                  
 13685                                  mine:
 13686 0000137B 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13687 0000137D 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13688 0000137F 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13689 00001381 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13690 00001383 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13691                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13692                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13693 00001385 CF                      		iret
 13694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13695                                  
 13696                                  disp_func:
 13697 00001386 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13698 00001388 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13699 0000138A 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13700 0000138C 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13701                                  
 13702                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13703                                  
 13704 0000138E 1E                      		push	ds
 13705 0000138F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13706                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13707                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13708                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13709                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13710                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13711 00001394 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13712 00001398 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13713 0000139C 1F                      		pop	ds
 13714                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13715                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 13716                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1708h
 13717 0000139D EA[1907]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry ; BIOSDATA:dsk_entry
 13718                                  		;; 17/10/2022
 13719                                  		;;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13720                                  		; 20/09/2023
 13721                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13722                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13723                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13724                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13725                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13726                                  
 13727                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13728                                  
 13729                                  do_subfun_01:
 13730 000013A2 06                      		push	es
 13731 000013A3 1E                      		push	ds
