 14930                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14931                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14932                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14933                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14934                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14935                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14936                                  
 14937                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14938 000017F1 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14939 000017F3 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14939 000017FC 736B6574746520666F-
 14939 00001805 7220647269766520   
 14940                                  
 14941                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14942 0000180D 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14942 00001816 65737320616E79206B-
 14942 0000181F 6579207768656E2072-
 14942 00001828 656164790D0A       
 14943 0000182E 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14944                                  
 14945                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14946                                  
 14947                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14948                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14949                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14950                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14951                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14952                                  
 14953                                  chkopcnt:		
 14954 00001830 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14955 00001835 C3                      		retn
 14956                                  
 14957                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14958                                  
 14959                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14960                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14961                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14962                                  ;
 14963                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14964                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14965                                  
 14966                                  mediacheck:	
 14967 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14968 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14969 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14970 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14971 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14972 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14973 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 14974 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 14975 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14976                                  					; set logical drive number
 14977 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14978 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14979                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14980                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14981 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 14982 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 14983 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14984 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14985                                  
 14986                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14987                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14988                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14989                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14990                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14991                                  ; status.
 14992                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14993 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14994 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14995                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14996                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14997                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14998                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14999 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15000                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15001                                  
 15002                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15003                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15004                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15005                                  
 15006 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 15007 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 15008 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 15009 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15010 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 15011 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 15012 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 15013 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15014 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15015                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15016 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15017                                  mediaret:				
 15018 0000186F C3                      		retn
 15019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15020                                  
 15021                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15022                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15023                                  ; or write.
 15024                                  
 15025                                  mediadovolid:				
 15026 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15027 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15028 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15029 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15030 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15032                                  
 15033                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15034                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15035                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15036                                  ; dos.
 15037                                  ;
 15038                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15039                                  
 15040                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15041                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15042                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15043                                  
 15044                                  checklatchio:	
 15045                                  
 15046                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15047                                  			
 15048 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15049 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15050                                  
 15051                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15052                                  
 15053 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15054 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15057                                  ; expensive verification.
 15058                                  
 15059 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15060 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15061 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15062 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15063 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15064 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15065 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15066                                  checklatchret:				
 15067 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15068                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15069 0000189B F9                      		stc
 15070 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15071                                  checkret:				
 15072 0000189D C3                      		retn
 15073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15076                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15077                                  ;
 15078                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15079                                  
 15080                                  checkfatvid:				
 15081 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15082 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15083 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15084                                  
 15085                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15086                                  
 15087                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15088                                  
 15089                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15090                                  
 15091                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15092                                  ;
 15093                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15094                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15095                                  ;
 15096                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15097                                  ;
 15098                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15099                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15100                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15101                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15102                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15103                                  ;
 15104                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15105                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15106                                  ; routine.)
 15107                                  ;
 15108                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15109                                  
 15110                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15111                                  check_vid:
 15112                                  
 15113                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15114                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15115                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15116                                  
 15117 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15118                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15119                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15120 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15121 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15122 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15123 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15124 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15125                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15126 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15127                                  					; if not fat system
 15128 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15129 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15130 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15131 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15132                                  					; definitely changed
 15133 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15134                                  
 15135 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15136                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15137 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15138                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15139                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15140                                  		;clc
 15141                                  checkfatret:				
 15142 000018CB C3                      		retn
 15143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15144                                  
 15145                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15146                                  changed_drv:
 15147 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15148 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15149                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15150 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15152                                  
 15153                                  ; extended id check
 15154                                  
 15155                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15156                                  
 15157                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15158                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15159                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15160                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15161                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15162                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15163                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15164                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15165                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15166                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15167                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15168                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15169                                  ;
 15170                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15171                                  
 15172                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15173                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15174 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 15175                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15176                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15177 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15178                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15179 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15180 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15181 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15182 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15183 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15184 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15185                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15186                                  					; don't know
 15187 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 15188 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15189                                  					; reset the flag
 15190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15191                                  
 15192                                  ext_changed:
 15193 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15194                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15195 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15196                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15197                                  					; disk changed!
 15198                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15199                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15200                                  		;clc
 15201 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  
 15205                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15206                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15207                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15208                                  ;
 15209                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15210                                  
 15211                                  checkio:				
 15212 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15213 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15214 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15215 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15216 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15217 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15218 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15219 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15220 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15221 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15222 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15223 00001908 C3                      		retn
 15224                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15225                                  
 15226                                  checkioerr:				
 15227 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15228                                  
 15229                                  checkioret:				
 15230 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15231 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15233                                  
 15234                                  no_error_map:				
 15235 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15236                                  
 15237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15238                                  
 15239                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15240                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15241                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15242                                  
 15243                                  returnvid:		
 15244 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15245                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15246 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15247 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15248 0000191B F9                      		stc
 15249 0000191C C3                      		retn
 15250                                  
 15251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15252                                  
 15253                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15254                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15255                                  ;
 15256                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15257                                  ; **trashes si**
 15258                                  
 15259                                  media_set_vid:				
 15260 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15261                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15262                                  
 15263                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15264                                  
 15265                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15266                                  
 15267                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15268                                  
 15269                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15270                                  vid_into_packet:
 15271 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15272 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15273 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15274 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15275 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15276 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15277 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 15278                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15279 00001931 C3                      		retn
 15280                                  
 15281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15282                                  
 15283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15284                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15285                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15286                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15287                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15288                                  ;
 15289                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15290                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15291                                  ;
 15292                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15293                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15294                                  ;		carry set
 15295                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15296                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15297                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15298                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15299                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15300                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15301                                  ;
 15302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15303                                  
 15304                                  hidensity:
 15305                                  
 15306                                  ; check for correct drive
 15307                                  		
 15308                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15309 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15310                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15311                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15312 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15313                                  
 15314                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15315                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15316                                  
 15317 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15318 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15319                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15320                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15321 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15322 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15323                                  
 15324                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15325                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15326                                  
 15327                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15328 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15329 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15330                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15331                                  					; ffOther
 15332 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15333 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15334                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15335                                  					; ff288
 15336 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15337 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15338 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15339                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15340                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15341 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15342                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15343                                  					; 2 sides
 15344                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15345 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15346 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15347                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15348                                  					; & head max
 15349                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15350 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15352                                  
 15353                                  Is720K:
 15354                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15355 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15356                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15357 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15359                                  
 15360                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15361                                  ;dofloppy:
 15362                                  		;retn
 15363                                  
 15364                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15365                                  
 15366                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15367                                  
 15368                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15369                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15370                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15371                                  ;
 15372                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15373                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15374                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15375                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15376                                  ;
 15377                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15378                                  ;
 15379                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15380                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15381                                  
 15382                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15383 00001964 06                      		push	es
 15384 00001965 57                      		push	di
 15385                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15386                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15387 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15390                                  
 15391                                  scan_bds:				
 15392 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15393 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15394                                  
 15395                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15396                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15397                                  
 15398 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15399                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15400                                  get_next_bds:				
 15401 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15402                                  					; go to	next bds
 15403 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15404 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15405 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 15406 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 15407 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15408                                  
 15409                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15410                                  
 15411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15412                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15413                                  ;
 15414                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15415                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15416                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15417                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15418                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15419                                  
 15420                                  checkromchange:	
 15421                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15422                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15423 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15424                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15425                                  					; fchanged
 15426 00001984 C3                      		retn
 15427                                  
 15428                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15429                                  
 15430                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15431                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15432                                  ;
 15433                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15434                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15435                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15436                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15437                                  
 15438                                  resetchanged:	
 15439                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15440                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15441 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15442                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15443                                  					; ~fchanged
 15444 0000198A C3                      		retn
 15445                                  
 15446                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15447                                  
 15448                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15449                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15450                                  ;
 15451                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15452                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15453                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15454                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15455                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15456                                  
 15457                                  haschange:
 15458                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15459                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15460 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15461                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15462                                  					; fchangeline
 15463 00001990 C3                      		retn
 15464                                  
 15465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15466                                  
 15467                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15468                                  
 15469                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15470                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15471                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15472                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15473                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15474                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15475                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15476                                  
 15477                                  ; set_volume_id
 15478                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15479                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15480                                  ;
 15481                                  ;   on entry:
 15482                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15483                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15484                                  ;
 15485                                  ;   on exit:
 15486                                  ;	carry clear:
 15487                                  ;	   successful call
 15488                                  ;	carry set
 15489                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15490                                  
 15491                                  set_volume_id:				
 15492 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15493 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 15494 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15495 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15496 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15497 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15498 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15499 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15500                                  setvret:				
 15501                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15502                                  		; cf = 0
 15503                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15504 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15505 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 15506 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 15507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15508                                  
 15509                                  seterr:					
 15510 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15511 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15512 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15513                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15514 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15515                                  
 15516                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15517                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15518                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15519                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15520                                  
 15521                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15522                                  
 15523                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15524                                  
 15525                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15526                                  ;
 15527                                  ;   on entry:
 15528                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15529                                  ;
 15530                                  ;   on exit:
 15531                                  ;	carry clear
 15532                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15533                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15534                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15535                                  ;
 15536                                  ;	carry set:
 15537                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15538                                  
 15539                                  read_volume_id:
 15540 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15541 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15542 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15543 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15544 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15545 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15546 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15547 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15548 000019B3 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15549 000019B6 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15550                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15551 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15552 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15553 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15554 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15555 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15556                                  					; # of fats
 15557 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15558                                  					; sectors / fat
 15559 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15560 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15561                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15562                                  					;
 15563                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15564                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15565 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15566                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15567                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15568 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15569                                  					; # root dir entries
 15570 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15571 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15572                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15573                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15574 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15575                                  next_sec:
 15576 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15577 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15578                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15579                                  					; get sector #
 15580 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15581                                  					; sectors / track
 15582 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15583 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15584                                  
 15585                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15586                                  
 15587 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15588                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15589 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15590 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15591 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15592                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15593 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15594 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15595 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15596                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15597 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15598 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15599 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15600                                  fvid_loop:
 15601                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15602 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15603                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15604 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15605 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15606 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15607 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15608 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15609                                  ent_loop:
 15610 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15611 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15612 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15613 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15614                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15615                                  					; next sector
 15616 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15617                                  notfound:
 15618                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15619                                  		;xor	si, si
 15620 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15621                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15622                                  
 15623                                  found_vid:
 15624                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15625                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15626 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15627 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15628 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15629 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15630 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15631 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15632 00001A23 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15633 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15634                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15635 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15636                                  		;xor	al, al
 15637                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15638 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15639 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15640                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15641                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15642                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15643 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15644 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15645                                  fvid_ret:
 15646                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15647 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15648                                  				
 15649 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15650                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15651                                  		; cf = 0
 15652                                  		;clc
 15653                                  rvidret:
 15654 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15655 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15656 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15657 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15658                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15659                                  
 15660                                  no_vid:
 15661 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15662                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15663                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15664 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15666                                  
 15667                                  readviderr:
 15668 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15669 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15670 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15671                                  
 15672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15673                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15674                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15675                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15676 00001A3D BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15677                                  		;
 15678                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15679                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15680                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15681                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15682 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15683 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15684                                  		;
 15685 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15686 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15687                                  
 15688                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15689                                  
 15690                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15691                                  ;
 15692                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15693                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15694                                  
 15695                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15696 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15697 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15698 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15699                                  		
 15700                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15701                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15702                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15703                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15704                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15705                                  		;cld
 15706                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15707 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15708                                  
 15709 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15710 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15711 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15712 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15713 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15714                                  
 15715                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15716                                  
 15717                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15718                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15719                                  ;
 15720                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15721                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15722                                  
 15723                                  check_volume_id:
 15724 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15725 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15726                                  		
 15727                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15728                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15729                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15730                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15731                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15732                                  		;cld
 15733                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15734 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15735                                  
 15736 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15737 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15738 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15739 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15740                                  
 15741                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15742                                  
 15743                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15744                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15745                                  ;
 15746                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15747                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15748                                  ;
 15749                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15750                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15751                                  ;
 15752                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15753                                  
 15754                                  fat_check:		
 15755 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15756 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15757 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15758 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15759                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15760 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15761 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15762                                  okret1:					
 15763 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15764 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15765                                  
 15766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15767                                  
 15768                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15769                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15770                                  
 15771                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15772                                  
 15773                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15774                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15775                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15776                                  
 15777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15778                                  
 15779                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15780                                  		;db 0
 15781                                  
 15782                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15783                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15784                                  
 15785                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15786 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15787                                  %endif
 15788                                  
 15789                                  ;align 16
 15790                                  
 15791                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15792                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15793                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15794                                  BCODEEND:
 15795                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15796                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15797                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15798                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15799                                  
 15800                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15801                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15802                                  
 15803                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15804

 15806                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15807                                  ; ============================================================================
 15808                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15815                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT

 15817                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
