 31536                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31537                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31539                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31540                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31541                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31542                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31543                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31544                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31545                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31546                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31547                                  ;      ...
 31548                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31549                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31550                                  
 31551                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31552                                  AddrToUmb:
 31553                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31554                                  	;push	cx
 31555                                  	;push	dx
 31556 00002C49 06                      	push	es
 31557                                  
 31558 00002C4A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31559                                  
 31560 00002C4C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31561 00002C4F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31562                                  
 31563                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31564                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31565 00002C51 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31566                                  
 31567                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31568                                  atu10:
 31569 00002C53 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31570                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31571                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31572                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31573                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31574                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31575                                  
 31576                                  ;atu10:	
 31577                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31578 00002C55 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31579 00002C57 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31580                                  
 31581 00002C59 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31582 00002C5C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31583                                  
 31584 00002C5E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31585                                  atu20:	
 31586                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31587                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31588                                  	; 22/07/2023

 31629                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31630                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31631                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31632                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31633                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31634                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31652 00002C88 48                      	dec	ax

 32191                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32192                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32193                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32194                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32195                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32196                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32197                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32198                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32199                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32200                                  
 32201                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32202                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32203                                  findUMB:
 32204                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32205                                  	;push	ax
 32206                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32207 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32208                                  	;push	dx
 32209                                  
 32210 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32211                                  
 32212 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32213                                  
 32214 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32215                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32216                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32217 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32218                                  
 32219                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32220                                  fu10:
 32221 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32223                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32224                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32225                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32227                                  
 32228                                  ;fu10:	
 32229 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32230 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32231                                  
 32232 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32233 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32234                                  
 32235 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32236                                  fu20:	
 32237                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32238                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32239                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32240 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32241 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32242                                  
 32243                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32244                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32245                                  	; ax = es
 32246                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32247                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32248 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32249 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 32250                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32251                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32252 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32253                                  fuE:	
 32254 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 32255                                  fuX:
 32256                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32257                                  	;pop	dx
 32258                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32259 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32260                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32261 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 32262                                  
 32263                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32264                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32265                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32267                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32268                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32269                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32270                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32271                                  
 32272                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32273                                  BigFree:
 32274                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32275                                  	;push	bx
 32276 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 32277                                  
 32278 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32279 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32280                                  
 32281 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32282 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32283                                  
 32284                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32285                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32286                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32287                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32288                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32289                                  
 32290                                  bf10:	
 32291 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32292 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32293                                  
 32294                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32295 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32296 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32297                                  
 32298 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32299                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32300 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32301                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32302                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32303 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32304                                  
 32305 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32306                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32307 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32308                                  
 32309                                  bf20:	
 32310                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32311                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32312                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32313                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32314 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32315 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32316                                  
 32317                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32318 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32319                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32320 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32321 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 32322 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32323                                  
 32324 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32325                                  
 32326 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32327 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32328 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32329 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32330                                  bfE:	
 32331 00002DBA F9                      	stc
 32332                                  bfX:
 32333 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 32334                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32335                                  	;pop	bx
 32336 00002DBC C3                      	retn
 32337                                  
 32338                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32339                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32340                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32341                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32342                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32343                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32352

 32354 00002DBF 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 32355

 32357                                  	;
 32358                                  	;push	ds

 32365                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32366                                  	; ds = cs
 32367 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32368                                  
 32369 00002DC5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32370                                  
 32371                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32372                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32373                                  	;pop	ax
 32374                                  
 32375 00002DC7 C3                      	retn
 32376                                  
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32379                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32380                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32381                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32382                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32383                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32384                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32385                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32386                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32387                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32388                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32389                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32390                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32391                                  
 32392                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32393                                  
 32394                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32395                                  
 32396                                  shrinkMCB:
 32397                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32398                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32399                                  	;push	bx
 32400 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 32401 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 32402                                  
 32403 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32404                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32405                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32406                                  
 32407 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32408                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32409 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32410                                  
 32411 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32412                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32413                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32414                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32415                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32416                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32417                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32418 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32419 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32420                                  
 32421 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32422                                  	
 32423                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32424                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32425 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32426                                  
 32427 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32428 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32429                                  
 32430 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32431 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 32432 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32433                                  
 32434 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32435 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32436                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32437                                  	; ax > 0
 32438 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32439                                  
 32440                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32441 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32442                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32443 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32444                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32445                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32446                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32447                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32448                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32449                                  
 32450                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32451 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32452                                  
 32453                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32454                                  	; cf=0
 32455                                  	;clc
 32456                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32457                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32458                                  smE:	
 32459                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32460                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32461                                  	;stc
 32462                                  smX:	
 32463                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32464 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 32465 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 32466                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32467                                  	;pop	bx
 32468 00002E04 C3                      	retn
 32469                                  
 32470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32471                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32472                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32473                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32474                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32475                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32476                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32477                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32478                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32479                                  ;
 32480                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32481                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32482                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32483                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32484                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32485                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32486                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32487                                  ;       Endif
 32488                                  ;    Endif
 32489                                  ; Endif
 32490                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32491                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32492                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32493                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32494                                  ;    ENDIF
 32495                                  ; ENDIF
 32496                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32497                                  
 32498                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32499                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32500                                  _hideUMB_:
 32501                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32502                                  	; ds = cs
 32503                                  
 32504                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32505                                  	;push	bx
 32506                                  	;push	dx
 32507 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 32508                                  
 32509 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32510 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32511 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32512                                  
 32513 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32514 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32515 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32516                                  
 32517 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32518 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32519 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32520 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32521                                  
 32522 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32523 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32524                                  
 32525 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32526 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32527                                  
 32528 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32529 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32530 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32531                                  hu_10:	
 32532                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32533                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32534                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32535                                  ;isTiny:
 32536                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32537                                  	;or	al,al
 32538 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32539 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32540                                  
 32541 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32542 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32543                                  
 32544 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32545 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32546                                  
 32547 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32548 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32549 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32550                                  
 32551 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32552                                  hu_30:	
 32553 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32554                                  
 32555 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32556                                  
 32557 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32558 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32559                                  
 32560 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32561 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32562                                  hu_X:	
 32563 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 32564                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32565                                  	;pop	dx
 32566                                  	;pop	bx
 32567 00002E52 C3                      	retn
 32568                                  
 32569                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32570                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32571                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32572                                  ; Entry:  None
 32573                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32574                                  ; Error:  None
 32575                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32576                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32577                                  
 32578                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32579                                  UnFreeze:
 32580                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32581                                  	;push	ax
 32582 00002E53 06                      	push	es
 32583                                  
 32584 00002E54 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32585 00002E57 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32586                                  
 32587                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32588                                  uf10:
 32589 00002E59 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32590                                  
 32591                                  ; ------------------------------
 32592                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32593                                  ; ------------------------------
 32594                                  
 32595                                  ;uf10:	
 32596 00002E5B E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32597 00002E5E 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32598 00002E60 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32599                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32600                                  	; ax <> es
 32601 00002E63 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32602                                  uf20:	
 32603                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32604                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32605                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32606 00002E65 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32607 00002E6B 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32608                                  
 32609                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32610                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32611                                  	; ax = es
 32612                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32613                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32614 00002E6D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32615 00002E72 40                      	inc	ax
 32616                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32617                                  	;mov	es,ax

 32855 00002F29 C3                      	retn

 33135 00002FD0 F5                      	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *

 33175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33176                                  ;
 33177                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33178                                  ;
 33179                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33180                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33181                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33182                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33183                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33184                                  ;
 33185                                  ;	Output : none
 33186                                  ;
 33187                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33188                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33189                                  ;
 33190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33191                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33192                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33193                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33194                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33196                                  
 33197                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33198                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33199                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33200                                  InitDevLoad:
 33201                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33202                                  	;push	es ; *
 33203                                  
 33204                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33205                                  	; ds = cs
 33206 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33207                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33208                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33209 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33210                                  
 33211                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33212                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33213                                  ; %if 0
 33214                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33215 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33216                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33217 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33218                                  
 33219                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33220                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33221                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33222                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33223                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33224                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33225                                  
 33226 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33227                                  
 33228 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33229 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33230 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33231 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33232 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33233 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33234                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33235                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33236                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33237 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33238                                  
 33239                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33240                                  
 33241                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33242                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33243                                  InitForConv:
 33244                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33245                                  	; ds = cs
 33246 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33247                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33248 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33249 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33250 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33251                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33252 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33253                                  					;  in low memory
 33254                                  InitForHi:
 33255                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33256                                  	; ds = cs
 33257                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33258                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33259                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33260 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33261 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33262 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33263 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33264                                  
 33265                                  InitForLo:
 33266                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33267                                  	; ds = cs
 33268                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33269 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33270                                  initforlo_x:
 33271                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33272                                  	; ds = cs
 33273                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33274                                  					;  we are loading low
 33275                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 33276                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33277 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33278 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33279                                  idl1:
 33280 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33281                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33282                                  	; ds = cs
 33283                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33284                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33285                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33286                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33287 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33288 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33289 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33290 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33291                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33292                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33293 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33294                                  
 33295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33296                                  ;
 33297                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33298                                  ;
 33299                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33300                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33301                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33302                                  ;		   current UMB
 33303                                  ;
 33304                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33305                                  
 33306                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33307                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33308                                  	; ds = cs
 33309                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33310                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33311                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33312 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33313 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33314 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33315                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33316                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33317                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33318                                  	;stc
 33319                                  	;retn
 33320                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33321 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33322 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33323                                  spcinumb1:
 33324 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33325                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33326                                  	; ds = cs
 33327 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33328                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33329                                  spcinumb2:
 33330 00003054 C3                      	retn
 33331                                  
 33332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33333                                  ;
 33334                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33335                                  ;
 33336                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33337                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33338                                  ;
 33339                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33340                                  
 33341                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33342                                  ;
 33343                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33344                                  ;	push	ds
 33345                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33346                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33347                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33348                                  ;	pop	ds
 33349                                  ;
 33350                                  ;	inc	ax
 33351                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33352                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33353                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33354                                  ;	retn
 33355                                  
 33356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33357                                  ;
 33358                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33359                                  ;
 33360                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33361                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33362                                  ;		 the device.
 33363                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33364                                  ;
 33365                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33366                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33367                                  ;	UMB.
 33368                                  ;
 33369                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33370                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33371                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33372                                  ;
 33373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33374                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33375                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33376                                  
 33377                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33378                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33379                                  	; ds = cs
 33380 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33381 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33382 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 33383                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33384                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33385                                  
 33386 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33387                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33388                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33389 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33390                                  
 33391 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 33392                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33393                                  	; ds = cs
 33394 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33395                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33396 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33397                                  
 33398 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 33399                                  
 33400 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33401 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 33402 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33403                                  
 33404                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33405                                  	;dec	ax
 33406                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33407                                  	;
 33408                                  PrepareMark:
 33409 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33410 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 33411 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33412 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33413 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33414 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 33415 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 33416                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33417                                  	; ds = cs
 33418                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33419                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33420                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33421                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33422 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33423 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33424 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33425                                  	;
 33426                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33427                                  	; cf=0
 33428                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33429 0000308C C3                      	retn
 33430                                  
 33431                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33432                                  %if 1
 33433                                  gufd_err:
 33434 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33435                                  gufd_error:
 33436 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33437 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33438 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33439                                  %endif
 33440                                  
 33441                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33442                                  %if 0
 33443                                  gufd_err:
 33444                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33445                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33446                                  	; ds = cs
 33447                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33448                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33449                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33450                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33451                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33452                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33453                                  	stc
 33454                                  	retn
 33455                                  %endif

 33457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33458                                  ;
 33459                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33460                                  ;
 33461                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33462                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33463                                  ;
 33464                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33465                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33466                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33467                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33468                                  ;
 33469                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33470                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33471                                  ;
 33472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33473                                  
 33474                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33475                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33476                                  
 33477                                  DevSetMark:
 33478 00003094 06                      	push	es
 33479                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33480                                  	;push	di
 33481 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 33482 00003096 56                      	push	si
 33483 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33484 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33485 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 33486 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33487                                  
 33488                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33489                                  
 33490 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 33491                                  
 33492                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33493                                  	; ds = cs
 33494                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33495 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33496                                  
 33497 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33498 000030AB FC                      	cld
 33499                                  dsm_again:
 33500 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 33501 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33502 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33503 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33504 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33505                                  isit_slash:
 33506 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 33507 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33508 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33509 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33510                                  isit_null:
 33511 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33512 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33513 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33514                                  
 33515 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33516 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33517                                  dsm_next_char:
 33518 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 33519 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al, al
 33520 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33521 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 33522 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33523 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 33524 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33525                                  blankout:
 33526 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33527 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 33528 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33529                                  dsm_exit:
 33530 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 33531 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 33532 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33533                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33534                                  	;pop	di
 33535 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 33536 000030DF C3                      	retn
 33537                                  
 33538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33539                                  ;
 33540                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33541                                  ;
 33542                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33543                                  ;
 33544                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33545                                  ;
 33546                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33547                                  ;	in DevSize
 33548                                  ;
 33549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33550                                  
 33551                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33552                                  SizeDevice:
 33553                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33554                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 33555 000030E0 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 33556 000030E1 06                      	push	es
 33557 000030E2 1F                      	pop	ds
 33558 000030E3 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 33559 000030E5 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 33560 000030E8 CD21                    	int	21h
 33561 000030EA 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 33562                                  
 33563 000030EC 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 33564 000030EE B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 33565 000030F1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 33566 000030F3 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 33567 000030F5 CD21                    	int	21h
 33568 000030F7 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 33569 000030F9 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 33570 000030FC 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33571 000030FF F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 33572                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 33573                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33574 00003103 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 33575 00003105 2EC706[5D1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 33576                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 33577 0000310C EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 33578                                  sd_ctp:	
 33579                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33580                                  ;szdev1:
 33581 0000310E B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 33582 00003110 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 33583 00003112 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 33584 00003114 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 33585 00003116 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 33586                                  	;
 33587                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 33588                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 33589                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33590                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33591                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 33592                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33593                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33594                                  	;clc
 33595                                  ;szdev2:
 33596 00003118 2EA3[5D1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 33597                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33598                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 33599                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 33600                                  
 33601                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33602                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33603                                  	; cf=0
 33604                                  	;clc
 33605                                  sd_close:
 33606 0000311C 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 33607                                  					;  carry flag
 33608 0000311D B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 33609 00003120 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 33610 00003122 9D                      	popf
 33611                                  sd_err:
 33612                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 33990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33991                                  ;
 33992                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33993                                  ;
 33994                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33995                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33996                                  ;
 33997                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33998                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33999                                  ;
 34000                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34001                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34002                                  ;
 34003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34004                                  
 34005                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34006                                  
 34007                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34008                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34009                                  
 34010                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34011                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34012                                  GetHexNum:
 34013 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34014 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34015                                  ghn_next:
 34016 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34017 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34018 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34019 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34020 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34021 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 34022 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34023 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34024 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 34025                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34026 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34027 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34028 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34029                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34030                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34031 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34032                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34033                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34034                                  ghn_shift1:
 34035 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34036 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34037 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34038 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34039 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34040 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34041                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34042 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34043 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34044 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34045 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34046                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34047                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34048                                  ghn_shift2:
 34049 00003251 F8                      	clc
 34050 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34051 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34052 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34053 00003258 F8                      	clc
 34054 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34055                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34056                                  ghn_err:
 34057                                  gnib_err:
 34058 0000325A F9                      	stc
 34059                                  ghn_ret:
 34060                                  gnib_ret:
 34061 0000325B C3                      	retn

 34065                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34066                                  ;
 34067                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34068                                  ;
 34069                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34070                                  ;
 34071                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34072                                  ;
 34073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34074                                  
 34075                                  GetNibble:

 34077                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34079 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34080 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34081 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34082 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34083 00003269 C3                      	retn
 34084                                  is_it_hex:
 34085 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34086                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34088 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34089 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34090 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34091 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34092 00003277 C3                      	retn

 34096                                  ;	stc

 34113                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34114                                  ;
 34115                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34116                                  ;
 34117                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34118                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34119                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34120                                  ;			; DS = data
 34121                                  ;
 34122                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34123                                  ;
 34124                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34125                                  ;
 34126                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34127                                  
 34128                                  umb_insert:
 34129 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34130                                  
 34131                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34132                                  	; ds = cs
 34133                                  
 34134                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34135 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34136                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34137 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34138 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34139 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34140                                  ui_next:
 34141 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34142                                  					;    new block
 34143 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34144                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34145                                  					;    last
 34146 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34147 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34148                                  					; N: get next block
 34149 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34150                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34151 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34152 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34153                                  
 34154                                  ui_insert:
 34155 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34156 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34157                                  
 34158 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34159 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34160                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34161 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34162                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34163 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34164                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34165 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34166                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34167 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34168                                  
 34169                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34170                                  
 34171 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34172 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34173 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34174                                  					; mark as free
 34175 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34176                                  					; start & end of new block
 34177 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34178                                  
 34179                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34180                                  	
 34181 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34182 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34183 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34184 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34185                                  
 34186                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34187                                  					; this block
 34188 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34189                                  	
 34190 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34191 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34192 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34193 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34194                                  
 34195 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ui_append:
 34198                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34199 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34200 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34201                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34202                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34203                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34204 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34205                                  
 34206 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34207 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34208 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34209                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34210 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34211                                  
 34212 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34213                                  
 34214 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34215 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34216 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34217 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34218                                  
 34219                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34220 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34221 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34222 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34223                                  					; mark as free
 34224 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34225 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34226                                  ui_done:
 34227                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34228 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34229                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34230                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34231                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34232 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34236                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 34237                                  ;
 34238                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 34239                                  ;
