 34242                                  AllocUMB:
 34243                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34244                                  	; ds = cs
 34245 00003336 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 34246 00003339 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 34247                                  au_next:
 34248 0000333B E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 34249 0000333E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 34250 00003340 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 34251 00003343 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 34252                                  au_coalesce:
 34253                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34254                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34255                                  ;au_exit:
 34256                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34257                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34258                                  ;	retn
 34259                                  
 34260                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34261                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34262                                  
 34263                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34264                                  
 34265                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34266                                  
 34267                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34268                                  ;
 34269                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34270                                  ;
 34271                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34272                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34273                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34274                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34275                                  ;
 34276                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34277                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34278                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34279                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34280                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34281                                  ;
 34282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34283                                  
 34284                                  umb_coalesce:
 34285                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34286                                  	; ds = cs
 34287 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34288                                  
 34289 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34290                                  
 34291                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34292                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34293 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34294 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34295                                  uc_nextfree:
 34296 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34297 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34298                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34299 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34300 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34301                                  					; N: get next arena
 34302 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34303 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34304 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34305                                  uc_again:
 34306 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34307 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34308                                  uc_check:
 34309 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34310 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34311                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34312 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34313 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34314                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34315 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34316 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34317 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34318 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34319                                  
 34320                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34321                                  ;uc_done:
 34322                                  	;retn
 34323                                  
 34324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34326                                  ; procedure : InitAllocUMB
 34327                                  ;
 34328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34329                                  
 34330                                  InitAllocUMB:
 34331                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34332                                  	; ds = cs
 34333 00003380 E828D7                  	call	IsXMSLoaded
 34334 00003383 7527                    	jnz	short iau_err		; quit on no XMS driver
 34335 00003385 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 34336 00003387 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 34337                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34338                                  	; ds = cs
 34339                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 34340 00003389 8C06[8A1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 34341 0000338D B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 34342 00003390 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 34343                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 34344                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34345 00003392 891E[731F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34346 00003396 8C06[751F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34347                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34348 0000339A 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34349                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34350                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 34351                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34352 0000339F 770A                    	ja	short ia_1 ; cf=0
 34353 000033A1 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 34354                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 34355                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34356 000033A4 7207                    	jc	short iau_err2  ; cf=1
 34357                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34358                                  	; ds = cs
 34359 000033A6 C606[891F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34360                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34361                                  ia_1:
 34362                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34363                                  	; cf=0
 34364                                  	;clc
 34365 000033AB C3                      	retn
 34366                                  iau_err:
 34367 000033AC F9                      	stc
 34368                                  iau_err2:
 34369 000033AD C3                      	retn

 34371                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34372                                  ;
 34373                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34374                                  ;
 34375                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34376                                  ;
 34377                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34378                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34379                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34380                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34381                                  ;				NC
 34382                                  ;			  else 
 34383                                  ;				CY
 34384                                  ;
 34385                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34386                                  ;
 34387                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34388                                  
 34389                                  umb_allocate:
 34390                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34391                                  	; ds = cs
 34392 000033AE 50                      	push	ax
 34393 000033AF B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34394 000033B1 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34395                                  					;   possible
 34396                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34397 000033B4 FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34398                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34399                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34400                                  					; the largest UMB
 34401 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34402 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34403                                  	
 34404 000033BC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34405                                  
 34406                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34407 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34408                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34409                                  
 34410 000033C2 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34411                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34412                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34413 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34414                                  ua_err:
 34415 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34416                                  
 34417                                  	;clc
 34418                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34419                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34420                                  	; cf=0
 34421                                  	;clc 
 34422                                  ua_done:
 34423 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 34424 000033C9 C3                      	retn
 34425                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34426                                  ;ua_err:
 34427                                  	;stc
 34428                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 34429                                  
 34430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34431                                  ;
 34432                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34433                                  ;
 34434                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34435                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34436                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34437                                  ;
 34438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34439                                  
 34440                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34441                                  get_next:
 34442 000033CA 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34443 000033CF 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34444                                  _get_next_:
 34445 000033D1 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34446 000033D3 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34447 000033D7 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34448 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34449                                  	;clc
 34450                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34451                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34452                                  	; cf=0
 34453                                  	;clc
 34454 000033DA C3                      	retn
 34455                                  gn_err:
 34456 000033DB F9                      	stc
 34457                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34458                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34459 000033DC C3                      	retn
 34460                                  
 34461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34462                                  ;
 34463                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34466                                  
 34467                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34468                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34469                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34470                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34471                                  	; ds = cs
 34472 000033DD E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 34473 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34474                                  
 34475                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34476                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34477                                  
 34478                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34479                                  	; ds = cs
 34480                                  
 34481 000033E2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34482 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34483 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34484                                  
 34485 000033E8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34486 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34487                                  
 34488 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34489                                  
 34490                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34491                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34492 000033EE 49                      	dec	cx
 34493 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34494                                  	
 34495 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34496 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34497                                  					
 34498 000033FE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34499 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34500                                  
 34501                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34502                                  
 34503 00003409 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34504 0000340B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34505 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34506                                  					; mark as free 
 34507 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34508 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34509                                  
 34510                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34511                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34512 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34513                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34514 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34515                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34516                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34517                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34518                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34519                                  
 34520                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34521                                  
 34522                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34523                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34524                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34525 00003427 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34526 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34527                                  ;scan_next
 34528                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34529                                  scannext:
 34530 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34531 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34532                                  	
 34533 00003434 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34534 00003436 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34535 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 34536 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34537                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34538                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34539 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34540                                  got_last:
 34541                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34542                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34543 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34544                                  
 34545 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34546                                  	;clc
 34547                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34548                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34549                                  	; cf=0
 34550                                  	;clc
 34551 0000344B C3                      	retn
 34552                                  
 34553                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34554                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34555                                  ;	;stc
 34556                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34557                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34558                                  ;	; cf=1
 34559                                  ;	;stc
 34560                                  ;	retn
 34561                                  
 34562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34563                                  ;
 34564                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34565                                  ;
 34566                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34567                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34568                                  ;
 34569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34570                                  
 34571                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34572                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34573                                  	; ds = cs
 34574 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34575                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34576 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34577 00003453 06                      	push	es
 34578                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34579                                  	;push	bx
 34580                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34581                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34582                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34583                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34584 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34585 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34586 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34587                                  	
 34588 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34589 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34590                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34591                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34592                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34593 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34594 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34595 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34596 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34597                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34598                                  	;pop	bx
 34599 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 34600                                  su_exit:
 34601 00003472 C3                      	retn
 34602                                  
 34603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34604                                  ;
 34605                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 34608                                  ;
 34609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34610                                  
 34611                                  UnlinkUMB:
 34612                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34613                                  	; ds = cs
 34614 00003473 1E                      	push	ds
 34615 00003474 06                      	push	es
 34616                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34617 00003475 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34618                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34619 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34620                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34621 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34622                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34623 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34624 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34625                                  ulu_next:
 34626 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34627 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34628 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34629 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34630 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34631 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34632                                  ulu_found:
 34633                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34634 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34635                                  ulu_x:
 34636 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 34637 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34638 0000349E C3                      	retn

 34641                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34642                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34643                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34644                                  
 34645                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34646                                  ;
 34647                                  ; Summary:
 34648                                  ;
 34649                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34650                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34651                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34652                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34653                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34654                                  ;
 34655                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34656                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34657                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34658                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34659                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34660                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34661                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34662                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34663                                  ;
 34664                                  ; Example:
 34665                                  ;
 34666                                  ;   [menu]
 34667                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34668                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34669                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34670                                  ;
 34671                                  ;   [network]
 34672                                  ;   include misc
 34673                                  ;   device=foo
 34674                                  ;
 34675                                  ;   [misc]
 34676                                  ;   device=bar
 34677                                  ;   include alternate
 34678                                  ;
 34679                                  ;   [alternate]
 34680                                  ;   device=tar
 34681                                  ;
 34682                                  ;
 34683                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34684                                  ;
 34685                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34686                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34687                                  ;
 34688                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34689                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34690                                  ;   following order:
 34691                                  ;
 34692                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34693                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34694                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34695                                  ;
 34696                                  
 34697                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34698                                  
 34699                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34700                                  
 34701                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34702                                  
 34703                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34704                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34705                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34706                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34707                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34708                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34709                                  
 34710                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34711                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34712                                  
 34713                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34714                                  
 34715                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34716                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34717                                  
 34718 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 34722                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34723                                  ;
 34724                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34725                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34726                                  ;
 34727                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34728                                  
 34729                                  setparms:
 34730 000034A0 1E                      	push	ds
 34731 000034A1 50                      	push	ax
 34732 000034A2 53                      	push	bx
 34733 000034A3 51                      	push	cx
 34734 000034A4 52                      	push	dx
 34735                                  
 34736 000034A5 0E                      	push	cs
 34737 000034A6 1F                      	pop	ds
 34738                                  
 34739 000034A7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34740 000034A9 8A1E[5B49]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 34741                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34742 000034AD 43                      	inc	bx
 34743                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 34744                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 34745 000034AE BA[3348]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 34746                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 34747                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 34748                                  	; 04/07/2023
 34749 000034B1 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 34750                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 34751                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 34752                                  	; 04/07/2023
 34753 000034B4 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 34754 000034B7 CD21                    	int	21h
 34755                                  
 34756                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34757 000034B9 8A26[5C49]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 34758                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 34759 000034BD A0[4748]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34760 000034C0 8A0E[5B49]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34761                                  ;
 34762                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34763                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34764                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 34765                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 34766                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34767                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34768                                  ;
 34769                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34770                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34771                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 34772                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 34773                                  ;
 34774                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34775                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34776                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34777                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 34778                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34779                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 34780                                  ;	
 34781                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 34782                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34783                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 34784                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34785                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34786                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 34787                                  
 34788 000034C4 BA7000                  	mov	dx,DOSBIODATASEG
 34789 000034C7 8EDA                    	mov	ds,dx
 34790                                  
 34791 000034C9 F6C404                  	test	ah,flagec35	; test byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 34792 000034CC 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35
 34793                                  
 34794                                  	;mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 34795                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 34796                                  	;;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 34797                                  	;or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 34798                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34799 000034CE B401                    	mov	ah,1
 34800 000034D0 D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 34801 000034D2 0826[2905]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah
 34802                                  
 34803                                  ; 07/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34804                                  ;	MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYINIT:3EB0h	
 34805                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34806                                  not_ec35:
 34807                                  ;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 34808                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 34809                                  
 34810                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34811                                  	;;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 34812                                  	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34813                                  	
 34814                                  	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 34815 000034D6 3A06[2C01]              	cmp	al,[eot]
 34816 000034DA 7603                    	jbe	short eot_ok
 34817 000034DC A2[2C01]                	mov	[eot],al
 34818                                  eot_ok:
 34819 000034DF 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 34820 000034E0 59                      	pop	cx
 34821 000034E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 34822 000034E2 58                      	pop	ax
 34823 000034E3 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 34824 000034E4 C3                      	retn

 34827                                  ;
 34828                                  ; procedure : diddleback
 34829                                  ;
 34830                                  ; replace default values for further drivparm commands
 34831                                  ;
 34832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34833                                  
 34834                                  diddleback:
 34835 000034E5 1E                      	push	ds
 34836 000034E6 0E                      	push	cs
 34837 000034E7 1F                      	pop	ds
 34838                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 34839 000034E8 C706[3748]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34840                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 34841 000034EE C606[3448]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 34842                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 34843 000034F3 C706[3548]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
 34844 000034F9 C706[5C49]0000          	mov	word [switches],0	    ; zero all switches
 34845 000034FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 34846 00003500 C3                      	retn
 34847

 34850                                  %if 0

 34854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34855                                  ;
 34856                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34857                                  ;
 34858                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34859                                  ;
 34860                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34861                                  
 34862                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34863                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 34864                                  
 34865                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34866                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34867                                  parseline:
 34868                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34869                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34870                                  
 34871                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34872                                  
 34873                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34874                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34875                                  
 34876                                  nextswtch:
 34877                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34878                                  	je	short done_line
 34879                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34880                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34881                                  
 34882                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34883                                  
 34884                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34885                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34886                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34887                                  	je	short getparm
 34888                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34889                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34890                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34891                                  swterr:
 34892                                  	retn
 34893                                  
 34894                                  getparm:
 34895                                  	call	check_switch
 34896                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34897                                  	jc	short swterr
 34898                                  getnext:
 34899                                  	call	getchr
 34900                                  	;jc	short done_line
 34901                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 34902                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34903                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 34904                                  ;swterr:
 34905                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34906                                  
 34907                                  done_line:
 34908                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34909                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34910                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34911                                  	jnz	short okay
 34912                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34913                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34914                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34915                                  	retn
 34916                                  
 34917                                  okay:
 34918                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34919                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34920                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34921                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34922                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34923                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34924                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34925                                  	; cf=0
 34926                                  	;clc
 34927                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 34928                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34929                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 34930                                  ;exitpl:
 34931                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34932                                  	; ds = cs
 34933                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34934                                  	retn
 34935                                  put_back:
 34936                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34937                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34938                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34939                                  
 34940                                  %endif
 34941                                  
 34942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34943                                  ;
 34944                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34945                                  ;
 34946                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34947                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34948                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34949                                  ; error.
 34950                                  ;
 34951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34952                                  
 34953                                  ; 09/09/2023
 34954                                  
 34955                                  err_swtch:
 34956 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 34957                                  err_check:
 34958 00003503 F9                      	stc
 34959                                  err_chk:
 34960                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34961 00003504 C3                      	retn
 34962                                  
 34963                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34964                                  
 34965                                  check_switch:
 34966 00003505 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 34967                                  	;jc	short err_check
 34968 00003508 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 34969 0000350A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 34970 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 34971                                  	;jb	short err_check
 34972 0000350E 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34973 00003510 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 34974 00003512 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 34975                                  
 34976 00003514 06                      	push	es
 34977                                  
 34978 00003515 0E                      	push	cs
 34979 00003516 07                      	pop	es
 34980                                  
 34981                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 34982                                  	;mov	ch,0
 34983                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 34984                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34985 00003517 BF[F049]                	mov	di,switchlist
 34986 0000351A 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 34987 0000351C B500                    	mov	ch,0
 34988 0000351E 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 34989                                  
 34990 0000351F F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 34991                                  
 34992 00003521 07                      	pop	es
 34993 00003522 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 34994                                  
 34995 00003524 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 34996 00003527 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 34997 00003529 8B1E[5C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 34998 0000352D 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 34999 0000352F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35000                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35001 00003531 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35002                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35003 00003533 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch
 35004                                  
 35005 00003535 E8F40C                  	call	getchr
 35006 00003538 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35007                                  
 35008 0000353A 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35009 0000353C 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35010                                  
 35011 0000353E E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35012 00003541 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35013                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35014                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35015                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35016                                  	; ds = cs
 35017 00003542 C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 35018 00003547 E8980D                  	call	getnum
 35019                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35020                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35021 0000354A C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35022 0000354F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35023                                  
 35024                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35025                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35026                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35027                                  
 35028                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35029                                  	;call	process_num
 35030                                  	;jmp	short process_num
 35031                                  
 35032                                  ;done_swtch:
 35033                                  ;	;clc
 35034                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35035                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35036                                  ;	; cf=0
 35037                                  ;	;clc
 35038                                  ;	retn
 35039                                  
 35040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35041                                  ;
 35042                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35043                                  ;
 35044                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35045                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35046                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35047                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35048                                  ;
 35049                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35050                                  
 35051                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35052                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35053                                  process_num:
 35054 00003550 850E[5C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35055 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35056                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35057 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35058                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35059 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35060 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35061                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35062                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35063                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35064                                  	; cf=0
 35065 0000355E C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35066                                  try_f:
 35067                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35068 0000355F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35069                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35070 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35071                                  
 35072                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35073                                  
 35074                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35075 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35076                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35077                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35078                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35079                                  	; cf=0
 35080 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35081                                  try_t:
 35082 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35083 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35084                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35085 0000356C F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35086                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35087 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35088                                  
 35089                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 35090 00003571 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35091                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35092                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35093                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35094                                  	; cf=0
 35095 00003574 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35096                                  try_s:
 35097                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35098 00003575 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35099                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35100 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35101 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35102                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35103                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35104                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35105                                  	; cf=0
 35106 0000357D C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35107                                  
 35108                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35109                                  
 35110                                  try_h:
 35111 0000357E A3[5749]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 35112                                  done_ret:
 35113                                  	;clc
 35114                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35115                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35116                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 35117                                  	;clc
 35118 00003581 C3                      	retn
 35119

 35129                                  ;
 35130                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.

 35132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35133                                  
 35134                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35135                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35136                                  
 35137                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35138                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35139                                  parseline:
 35140                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35141                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35142                                  
 35143                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35144                                  
 35145                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35146                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35147                                  
 35148                                  nextswtch:
 35149 00003582 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35150 00003584 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35151 00003586 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35152 00003588 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35153                                  
 35154                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35155                                  
 35156 0000358A 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35157 0000358C 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35158 0000358E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 35159 00003590 7402                    	je	short getparm
 35160 00003592 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input

 35218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35219                                  ;
 35220                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35221                                  ;
 35222                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35223                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35224                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35225                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35226                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35227                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35228                                  ;
 35229                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35230                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35231                                  ;
 35232                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35233                                  ;
 35234                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35235                                  
 35236                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35237                                  
 35238                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35239                                  
 35240                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35241                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35242                                  
 35243                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35244                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35245                                  
 35246                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35247                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35248                                  	; ds = cs
 35249

 35251                                  
 35252 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs
 35253 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 35254                                  
 35255 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35256 000035C9 8A1E[3448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]

 35258 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35259

 35261                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35262                                  got_80:

 35264 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35265

 35295                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35296 000035FF A3[4948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35297                                  
 35298                                  heads_not_altered:
 35299                                  
 35300                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35301                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35302                                  
 35303                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35304                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35305                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35306                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35307 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35308 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35309                                  
 35310 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35311                                  
 35312                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35313                                  
 35314                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35315                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35316 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35317                                  	
 35318                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35319                                  	; ax = 2
 35320 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35321                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35322 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 35323                                  
 35324 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35325                                  
 35326                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35327                                  
 35328 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35329                                  
 35330                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35331                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35332                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35333                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35334                                  
 35335                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35336                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35337                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35338                                  
 35339 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35340 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35341 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35342 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35343                                  
 35344                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35345                                  
 35346 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35347                                  
 35348                                  ;	check for 320K
 35349                                  
 35350                                  not_144m:
 35351 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35352 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35353 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35354 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35355                                  
 35356 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35357 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 35358                                  
 35359                                  only_one_head:
 35360                                  
 35361                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35362                                  
 35363 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35364 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35365                                  
 35366                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35367                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35368                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35369                                  
 35370 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35371 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35372                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35373 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35374                                  
 35375 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35376                                  
 35377                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35378                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35379                                  
 35380                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35381                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35382                                  	; ax = 2
 35383 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35384 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35385                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35386                                  
 35387                                  got_correct_mediad:
 35388 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35389                                  
 35390                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35391                                  
 35392 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35393 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35394 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35395 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35396 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35397                                  
 35398 00003663 C3                      	retn
 35399

 35950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35951                                  ;
 35952                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35955                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35956                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35957                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35958                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35959                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35960                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35961                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35962                                  ;
 35963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35964                                  
 35965                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35966                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35967                                  
 35968                                  skip_comment:
 35969 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35970                                  
 35971                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35972                                  	; ds = cs	
 35973                                  
 35974 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35975                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35976 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35977                                  
 35978 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35979                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35980 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35981                                  
 35982 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35983                                  	
 35984 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35985                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35986 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35987                                  
 35988 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35989                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35990 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35991                                  
 35992 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35993                                  	
 35994 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35995                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35996 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35997                                  skip_cmmt:
 35998 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35999 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36000 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 36001 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 36002 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36003 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36004                                  no_commt:
 36005 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 36007                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 36014                                  
 36015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36016                                  ;
 36017                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36018                                  ;
 36019                                  ;   INPUT
 36020                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36021                                  ;
 36022                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36023                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36024                                  ;
 36025                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36026                                  ;       All
 36027                                  ;
 36028                                  ;   HISTORY
 36029                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36030                                  ;
 36031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36032                                  
 36033                                  kbd_read:
 36034 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36035 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36036                                  
 36037 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36038 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36039 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36040                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36041                                  kbd_loop:
 36042 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36043 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36044 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36045 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36046 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36047 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36048 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36049 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36050                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36051                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36052 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36053                                  
 36054 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36055 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36056                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36057 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36058                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36059 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36060 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36061 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36062 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36063 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36064 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36065 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36066                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36067 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36068                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36069 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36070 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36071 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36072 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36073 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36074                                  
 36075                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36076 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36077 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36078                                  	
 36079 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36080 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36081                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36082 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36083 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36084                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36085 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36086 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36087                                  kbd_notf5:
 36088                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36089 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36090 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36091                                  
 36092 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36093 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36094                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36095 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36096 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36097 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36098 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36099                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36100 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36101 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36102 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36103 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36104 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36105                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36106 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36107 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36108                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36109 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36110 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36111 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36112                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
