 37167 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37168 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37169 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37170 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37171 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37172 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37173 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37174                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37175 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37176 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37177 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37178                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37179 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37180 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37181                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37182 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37183 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37184 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37185 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37186                                  
 37187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37188                                  
 37189                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37190                                  comp_names_x:
 37191                                  	;
 37192                                  comp_names_safe:
 37193 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37194 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37195 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37196 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37197 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37198 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37199 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37200 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37201 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37202 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37203 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37204 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37205                                  
 37206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37207                                  ;
 37208                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37209                                  ;
 37210                                  ;   INPUT
 37211                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37212                                  ;
 37213                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37214                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37217                                  ;       None
 37218                                  ;
 37219                                  ;   NOTES
 37220                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37221                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37222                                  ;
 37223                                  ;   HISTORY
 37224                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37225                                  ;
 37226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37227                                  
 37228                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37229                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37230                                  
 37231                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37232 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37233 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37234 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 37235 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37236 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37237 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37238 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37239 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37240 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37241 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37242 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37243 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37244 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37245 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37246 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37247 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37248 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37249 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37250 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37251 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37252 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37253 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37254 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37255 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37256 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37257 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37258                                  print_other:                    ;
 37259 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37260 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37261 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37262 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37263 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37264 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37265 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37266 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37267 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37268 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37269 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37270                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37271 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37272 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37273 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37274 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37275 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37276                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37277 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37278 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37279 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37280 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37281 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37282 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37283                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37284 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37285 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37286 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37287 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37288 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37289                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37290 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37291 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37292 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37293 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37294 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37295 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37296 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37297 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37298 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37299 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37300 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37301 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37302                                  print_done:                     ;
 37303 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37304 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37305 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37306 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37307 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37308 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37309 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37310 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37311 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37312 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37313                                  
 37314                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37315                                  ;
 37316                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37317                                  ;
 37318                                  ;   INPUT
 37319                                  ;       None
 37320                                  ;
 37321                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37322                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37323                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37324                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37325                                  ;
 37326                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37327                                  ;       None
 37328                                  ;
 37329                                  ;   NOTES
 37330                                  ;       None
 37331                                  ;
 37332                                  ;   HISTORY
 37333                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37334                                  ;
 37335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37336                                  
 37337                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37338 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37339 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37340 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37341 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37342 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37343 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37344 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37345 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37346 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37347                                  check_time:
 37348 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37349 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37350 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37351 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37352 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37353 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37354                                  show_time:
 37355 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37356 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37357 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37358 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37359 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37360 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37361 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37362 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37363 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37364 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37365 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37366 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37367 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37368 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37369 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37370 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37371 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37372 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37373 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37374 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37375 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37376 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37377 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37378 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37379 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37380 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37381 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37382                                  input_key:
 37383 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37384 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37385 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37386 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37387 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37388 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37389 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37390 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37391 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37392 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37393 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37394 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37395 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37396                                  got_time:
 37397 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37398 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37399 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37400 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37401                                  got_key:
 37402 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37403 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37404 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37405 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37406 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37407 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37408 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37409 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37410 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37411 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37412 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37413                                  
 37414                                  timeout_disabled:
 37415 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37416 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37417 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37418 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37419 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37420                                  
 37421 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37422 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37423 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37424 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37425 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37426 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37427 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37428 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37429                                  not_up:
 37430 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37431 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37432 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37433 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37434 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37435 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37436 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37437                                  print1: 
 37438 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37439                                  print2: 
 37440 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37441 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37442                                  to_input_key:
 37443 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37444                                  not_down:
 37445 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37446 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37447 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?

 37452                                  not_f8:
 37453 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37454 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37455                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37456                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37457                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)

 37463                                  normal_key:

 37484                                  
 37485                                  	; fall into disp_input

 37606                                  ;
 37607                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37608                                  ;
 37609                                  ;   INPUT
 37610                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37611                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37612                                  ;
 37613                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37614                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37615                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37616                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37617                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37618                                  ;
 37619                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37620                                  ;       AX
 37621                                  ;
 37622                                  ;   NOTES
 37623                                  ;       None
 37624                                  ;
 37625                                  ;   HISTORY
 37626                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37627                                  ;
 37628                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37629                                  
 37630                                  skip_token:
 37631 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37632 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37633 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37634 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37635                                  skip_check_eol:
 37636 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37637 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37638 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37639 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37640 0000404D F8                              clc
 37641                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37642 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37643                                  skip_token_eol:
 37644 0000404F F9                              stc
 37645                                  skip_token_done:
 37646 00004050 C3                              retn
 37647                                  
 37648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37649                                  ;
 37650                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37651                                  ;
 37652                                  ;   INPUT
 37653                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37654                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37655                                  ;
 37656                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37657                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37658                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37659                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37660                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37661                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37662                                  ;
 37663                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37664                                  ;       AX
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   NOTES
 37667                                  ;       None
 37668                                  ;
 37669                                  ;   HISTORY
 37670                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37671                                  ;
 37672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37673                                  
 37674                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37675 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37676 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37677 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37678 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37679 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37680 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37681                                  
 37682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37683                                  ;
 37684                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37685                                  ;
 37686                                  ;   INPUT
 37687                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37688                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37689                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37690                                  ;
 37691                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37692                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37693                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37694                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37695                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37696                                  ;
 37697                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37698                                  ;       AX
 37699                                  ;
 37700                                  ;   NOTES
 37701                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37702                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37703                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37704                                  ;
 37705                                  ;   HISTORY
 37706                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37707                                  ;
 37708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37709                                  
 37710                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37711                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37712                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37713                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37714                                       
 37715                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37716                                  
 37717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37718                                  ;
 37719                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37720                                  ;
 37721                                  ;   INPUT
 37722                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37723                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37726                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37727                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37728                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37729                                  ;
 37730                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37731                                  ;       AX
 37732                                  ;
 37733                                  ;   NOTES
 37734                                  ;       None
 37735                                  ;
 37736                                  ;   HISTORY
 37737                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37738                                  ;

 37740                                  
 37741                                  skip_line:
 37742 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37743 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37744                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37745 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah

 37747                                  skip_line_done:
 37748                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37749 00004069 C3                              retn

 37751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37752                                  ;
 37753                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37754                                  ;
 37755                                  ;   INPUT
 37756                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37757                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37758                                  ;
 37759                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37760                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37761                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37762                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37763                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37764                                  ;
 37765                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37766                                  ;       AX
 37767                                  ;
 37768                                  ;   NOTES
 37769                                  ;       None
 37770                                  ;

 37772                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37773                                  ;
 37774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37775                                  
 37776                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37777                                  
 37778                                  get_number:
 37779 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37780                                  num_loop:
 37781 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37782 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37783 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37784 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37785 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37786 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37787 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37788 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37789 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37790 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37791 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37792 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37793 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37794 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37795 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37796 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37797 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37798                                  
 37799                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37800                                  ;num_done:
 37801                                          ;retn
 37802                                  
 37803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37804                                  ;
 37805                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37806                                  ;
 37807                                  ;   INPUT
 37808                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37809                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37810                                  ;
 37811                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37812                                  ;       AL == next character
 37813                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37814                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37817                                  ;       AX
 37818                                  ;
 37819                                  ;   NOTES
 37820                                  ;       None
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;   HISTORY
 37823                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37824                                  ;
 37825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37826                                  
 37827                                  get_char:
 37828 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37829 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37830                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37831 00004090 26                      	es	
 37832 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37833 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37834 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37835                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37836 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37837                                  nearby_ret:
 37838 00004098 C3                              retn
 37839                                  
 37840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37841                                  ;
 37842                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37843                                  ;
 37844                                  ;   INPUT
 37845                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37846                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37847                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37848                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37849                                  ;
 37850                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37851                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37852                                  ;
 37853                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37854                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37855                                  ;
 37856                                  ;   NOTES
 37857                                  ;       None
 37858                                  ;
 37859                                  ;   HISTORY
 37860                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37861                                  ;
 37862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37863                                  
 37864                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37865                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37866                                  
 37867                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37868                                  query_user:
 37869 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37870                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37871 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37872 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37873                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37874                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37875                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37876                                  qu_1:
 37877 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37878 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37879 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37880 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37881 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37882 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37883 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37884                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37885 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37886                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37887                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37888                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37889                                  
 37890                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37891 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 37892 000040BA C3                      	retn
 37893                                  
 37894                                  query_all:
 37895                                  
 37896                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37897                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37898                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37899                                  
 37900 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37901 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37902 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37903 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37904                                  
 37905 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37906 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37907 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37908                                  find_match:                             ;
 37909 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37910 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37911 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37912 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37913 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37914 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37915 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37916                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37917 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37918                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37919 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37920 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37921 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37922                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37923 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37924 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37925 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37926 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37927 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37928 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37929 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37930 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37931 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37932                                  cmd_notset:
 37933 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37934                                  line_print:                             ;
 37935                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37936 000040F5 26                              es
 37937 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 37938 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37939 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37940 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37941                                  non_null:                               ;
 37942 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37943 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37944 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;

 38059                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38060                                  
 38061                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38062                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38063                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38064                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38065                                  
 38066                                  disable_autoexec:
 38067                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38068                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38069                                  
 38070 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38071 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38072 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38073 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38074 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38075                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38076 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38077 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38078                                  dae_1:
 38079                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38080 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38081                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38082 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38083 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38084 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38085 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38086 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38087 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38088 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38089 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38090 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38091 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38092 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38093                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38094 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38095 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38096 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38097 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;

 38102                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 38243                                  ; 
 38244                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38245                                  ;
 38246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38247                                  
 38248                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38249                                  
 38250                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38251                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38252                                  mapcase:
 38253 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 38254 00004244 56                      	push	si
 38255 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38256                                  
 38257 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38258 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38259                                  
 38260                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38261                                  
 38262                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38263                                  
 38264                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38265 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38266                                  ;else
 38267                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38268                                  ;endif
 38269                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38270                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38271                                  	;xor	si, si
 38272                                  
 38273                                  convloop:
 38274 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38275 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38276 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38277 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38278 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38279 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38280 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38281                                  noconv:
 38282                                  
 38283                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38284                                  
 38285                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38286                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38287                                  
 38288                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38289                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38290                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38291                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38292                                  ;
 38293 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38294 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38295 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38296 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38297                                  check_eol:
 38298 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38299 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38300 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38301 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38302                                  ;endif
 38303                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38304 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38305                                  convdone:
 38306 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38307 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38308 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38309 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38428                                  ;
 38429                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38430                                  ;
 38431                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38432                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38433                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38434                                  ;
 38435                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38436                                  
 38437                                  getnum:
 38438 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38439 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38440                                  b2:
 38441 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38442 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38443                                  
 38444 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38445 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38446                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38447                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38448 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38449 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38450 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38451 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38452 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38453 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38454                                  
 38455 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38456                                  
 38457 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38458 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38459 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38460 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38461 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38462 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38463 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38464 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38465 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38466 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38467 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38468                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38469                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38470                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38471                                  	;nop
 38472 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38473 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38474 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38475 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38476 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38477 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38478 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38479                                  b15:
 38480 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38481 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38482                                  b1:
 38483 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38484 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38485 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38486 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38487                                  badnum:
 38488                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38489                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0

 38494 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38495 00004339 C3                      	retn

 38499                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38500                                  
 38501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38502                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38503                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38504                                  ;	si = 0
 38505                                  ;	ax = country id
 38506                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38507                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38508                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38509                                  ;
 38510                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38511                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38512                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38513                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38515                                  
 38516                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38517                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38518

 38762                                  getcountrydestination:
 38763                                  
 38764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38765                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38766                                  ;
 38767                                  ;input: al - data id
 38768                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38769                                  ;on return:
 38770                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38771                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38773                                  
 38774                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38775                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38776                                  
 38777                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38778                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38779                                  
 38780 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 38781                                  	;add	di,74
 38782 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38783                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38784 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38785 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 38786 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38787                                  
 38788                                  getcntrydest:
 38789 00004468 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38790 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38791                                  
 38792 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38793 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38794                                  
 38795 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38796 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38797                                  
 38798                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38799                                  	;add	di,41
 38800 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38801                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38802 0000447B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38803 0000447D F9                      	stc
 38804                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38805                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38806                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38807 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 38808 0000447F C3                      	retn
 38809                                  
 38810                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38811                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38812 00004480 47                      	inc	di
 38813                                  
 38814                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38815                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1

 38818                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit

 38826                                  	; 10/09/2023

 38829 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 38830 00004489 C3                      	retn
 38831                                  
 38832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38833                                  
 38834                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38835                                  
 38836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38837                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38838                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38839                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38840                                  ;
 38841                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38842                                  ;	 be moved.
 38843                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38844                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38845                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38846                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38847                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38848                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38849                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38850                                  
 38851 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38852 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38853 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38854 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38855 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38856 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38857                                  
 38858 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38859 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38860 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38861 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38862 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38863                                  ricb_exit:
 38864 0000449D C3                      	retn
 38865

 38867                                  
 38868                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38869                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38870                                  %if 0
 38871                                  
 38872                                  set_country_path:
 38873                                  
 38874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38875                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38876                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38877                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38878                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38879                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38880                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38881                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38882                                  
 38883                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38884                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38885                                  
 38886                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38887                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38888                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38889                                  
 38890                                  	push	si
 38891                                  
 38892                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38893                                  	push	es
 38894                                  	pop	ds
 38895                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38896                                  
 38897                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38898                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38899                                  
 38900                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38901                                  	inc	si
 38902                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38903                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38904                                  
 38905                                  scp_default_drv:
 38906                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38907                                  	int	21h
 38908                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38909                                  
 38910                                  scp_setdrv:
 38911                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38912                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38913                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38914                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38915                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38916                                  
 38917                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38918                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38919                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38920                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38921                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38922                                  
 38923                                  scp_root_dir:
 38924                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38925                                  scp_path:
 38926                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38927                                  
 38928                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38929                                  scpath_exit:
 38930                                  
 38931                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38932                                  	push	es
 38933                                  	pop	ds
 38934                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38935                                  
 38936                                  	pop	si
 38937                                  	retn
 38938                                  
 38939                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38940                                  
 38941                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38942                                  
 38943                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38944                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38945                                  ;carry set if not.
 38946                                  
 38947                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38948                                  
 38949                                  	push	ax
 38950                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38951                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38952                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38953                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38954                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38955                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38956                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38957                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38958                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38959                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38960                                  
 38961                                  cdletter_no:
 38962                                  	stc
 38963                                  cdletter_exit:
 38964                                  	pop	ax
 38965                                  	retn
 38966                                  
 38967                                  %endif
 38968

 38970                                  
 38971                                  move_asciiz:
 38972                                  
 38973                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 38974                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 38975                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 38976                                  
 38977                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38978                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 38979                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 38980                                  
 38981                                  masciiz_loop:
 38982                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38983 0000449E F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 38984 000044A1 A4                      	movsb
 38985                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 38986                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 38987 000044A2 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 38988 000044A4 C3                      	retn

 39000 000044A7 89D6                    	mov	si,dx

 39003 000044AC BB[1E4A]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 39004                                  prnerr:

 39006 000044B0 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 39007 000044B1 E81D00                  	call	print
 39008                                  prn1:

 39014 000044BF 46                      	inc	si
 39015 000044C0 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 39016                                  prn2:

 39018 000044C4 E80A00                  	call	print
